2001.name: NS-44P Commissioner
2001.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

6005170.name: Recon Detection Device 2
6005170.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.

17016.name: NS-10 Burster
17016.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. VS use only.

6009003.name: Mauler Cannon
6009003.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

6005182.name: Frag Grenade
6005182.description:
The standard New Conglomerate frag grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.

44505.name: Frag Grenade
44505.description:
The standard New Conglomerate frag grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.

6008905.name: Bastion CIWS
6008905.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6003665.name: NS-45 Pilot
6003665.description: This unassuming three-round burst compact pistol carries surprising stopping power in close quarters. All factions can use NS weapons.

5220.name: L-24R Spur
5220.description:
The L-24R Spur is equipped with specialized optics that allow the pilot to adjust the weapons aim rather than being fixed forward.

Optics for this weapon are engaged with Weapon Optic function or Cockpit Mouse Freelook hotkeys.

6006610.name: AE Medical Applicator 5
6006610.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6005229.name: Ammunition Package 5
6005229.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

2874.name: M40 Fury
2874.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

7528.description: The NC05 Jackhammer's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat. It features a unique burst fire mode that doubles its rate of fire. NC use only.
7528.name: NC05 Jackhammer

803614.name: Bunker
803614.description: Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.

6005494.name: M20 Wyvern
6005494.description: The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

35002.name: Lancer VS22
35002.description: The Lancer VS22's particle accelerator is capable of firing a focused, high-velocity anti-armor projectile with pinpoint accuracy. The weapon has three charge-levels which increases damage and ammunition used. VS use only.

800624.name: Auraxium Mag-Cutter
800624.description: The Auraxium Mag-Cutter is only awarded to highly decorated New Conglomerate soldiers. It comes equipped with a powerful electromagnet that greatly enhances its cutting ability, allowing it to slice through heavy body armor.

803593.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Tower
803593.description: Construct a Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

5211.name: AP30 Shredder
5211.description: The AP30 Shredder machine gun is capable of inflicting sustained and accurate damage with its 30mm armor piercing rounds.  All factions can use this weapon.

6006186.name: MGR-A1 Vanquisher
6006186.description: The Vanquisher's performance is defined by its excellent stopping power over distance, delivered through a low recoil, three-round burst. NC use only.

6106.name: G30 Walker
6106.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

804956.name: Faction Banner
804956.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.

803808.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 5
803808.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

803428.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Tower
803428.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

4302.name: Saron Laser Cannon
4302.description: The Saron Laser Cannon is the standard nose cannon for the Vanu Sovereignty's Scythe. Its balanced reload, magazine size, and rate of fire allow it to adapt to any situation. VS use only.

6006147.name: NS Campion
6006147.description: The Campion has earned a sinister reputation on the battlefield after seeing extensive use by Stalker Infiltrators during its initial rollout.

16028.name: NCM3 Raven
16028.description: The left handed  NCM3 Raven is a laser guided rocket launcher that deals heavy damage to vehicles. NC use only.

6004284.name: Pain Spire
6004284.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that will damage enemy infantry and MAX within 15 meters of the spire. All Factions can use this item.

2512.name: M40 Fury-F
2512.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

804274.name: Turret AI Module
804274.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. VS use only.

803595.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803595.description: The Hoplon Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.

804875.name: RD-GG Recon Device 2
804875.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.

5441.name: Dual-75 Duster
5441.description: The Duster is equipped with dual 75mm cannons that are able to quickly unload its ten round magazine. Each shot decreases accuracy unless given time to recover; this allows the D-75 to feather accurate shots or bombard a wider area by unloading.

4445.description: The Antares LC's large magazine and steady damage allows pilots to maintain a constant stream of anti-aircraft fire from a safe distance. VS use only.
4445.name: Antares LC

7520.name: Cosmos VM3
7520.description: A late successor to the Quasar VM1, the Cosmos uses experimental plasma containment technology, resulting in larger rounds. These large plasma rounds cause less cranial trauma, but are significantly easier to strike mobile targets with. VS use only.

6005230.name: Ammunition Package 6
6005230.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

4905.name: Tomcat A2AM Pods
4905.description: After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. TR use only.

804271.name: Repair Module
804271.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. VS use only.

804745.name: NS-10B Burster
804745.description: This black, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

45.name: Shield Recharging Field
45.description:
Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 4.5 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.

6005235.name: G40-F Ranger
6005235.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6003418.name: NSX Fujin
6003418.description: The Fujin throwing knife harbors a kinetic edge that slices through infantry defenses, and provides a precision alternative to frag grenades.

803594.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803594.description: The Hoplon Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.

6006403.name: Halberd-H SE
6006403.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

1904.name: T1A Unity
1904.description: The TR released the Unity to commemorate the time-tested Cycler assault rifle, a key weapon attributed to helping bring Earth together under the Terran Republic's harmonious rule.

14.description: The standard assault rifle of the Terran Republic, the T1 Cycler features a 40-round magazine and a fast rate of fire, allowing it to remain effective in most situations. TR use only.
14.name: T1 Cycler

804726.name: NS-20G Gorgon
804726.description: This gold right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6002368.name: Alarm Module
6002368.description: Alerts the owner and their squad when an enemy is detected or a construct is attacked within 100 meters of the alarm module. Will automatically deconstruct if owner is offline for more than 2 minutes.

802514.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802514.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

129.description: Manufactured with an energy-efficient discharge coil, the high capacity Nova is capable of extended fire before needing to change power cores. VS use only.
129.name: Nova

7171.name: Gauss Compact Burst
7171.description: The NC2B Gauss Compact features a burst fire mode for controllable long range fire. NC use only.

6008901.name: Bastion CDWS
6008901.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6005422.name: Proximity Mine
6005422.description: A deceptive looking land mine that, upon detecting nearby enemy infantry, explodes into a cloud of anti-infantry shrapnel.

7413.name: Cerberus
7413.description: The Cerberus is able to fire overcharged rounds that are highly damaging in close range. VS use only.

3731.name: Titan-150 HESH
3731.description: The Titan-150 HESH is loaded with high-explosive squash head rounds that sacrifice some effectiveness against armor for increased lethality to enemy personnel. NC use only.

802515.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802515.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

6005380.name: G30 Walker
6005380.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

802900.name: M96 Mjolnir-H
802900.description: Affectionately referred to as "The Boombox" by many NC soldiers, the Mjolnir's burst fire explosive rounds excel against armored targets in close quarters engagements.

804871.name: RD-GG Recon Device
804871.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3.25 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.

6005383.name: M12 Kobalt-H
6005383.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

803618.name: HIVE
803618.description: While active, Hardline Interference Volume Emitters house cores which contribute to continent control in exchange for Cortium.

25003.name: SR-7
25003.description: The powerful bolt-action SR-7 is capable of eliminating targets from extremely long distances. TR use only.

4008.name: P2-120 AP
4008.description: The P2-120 AP is loaded with fast-moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets, but have less explosive yield than other projectiles. TR use only.

803732.name: Lasher X2 AE
803732.description: The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.

6005267.name: Restoration Kit
6005267.description: This single-use Restoration Kit regenerates 70 health per second for 12 seconds through needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

803425.name: WLT-Mandible Mining Laser
803425.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

6003603.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003603.description: The left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

2802.name: M12 Kobalt
2802.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

802904.name: NS Victory
802904.description: This double serrated combat knife is often bestowed by the leadership of all three Empires to veterans of successful military campaigns.

6002640.name: NS-61 "Ravenous" Emissary
6002640.description: The fully automatic NS-61 Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. All factions can use this weapon.

6004743.name: Water Balloon
6004743.description:
Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Limited event item.

2308.name: Hunter QCX
2308.description: The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

1939.name: Chaos
1939.description: Named for the pandemonium this highly modified plasma-core shotgun can cause in a surprise ambush, the Chaos' reputation as a very deadly flanking weapon has been well earned.

552.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
552.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

802910.name: NS-AM7B Archer
802910.description: The Archer anti-materiel rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to counter the heavily armored MAX, providing an effective option at range for dealing with the unique threat of the exo-suits.

7389.name: LA3 Desperado
7389.description: The 2-round burst LA3 Desperado can quickly eliminate targets at close range. NC use only.

500.name: MANA Anti-Vehicle Turret
500.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.

6009025.name: M18-2 Pincer
6009025.description: This high-capacity variant of the M18 Needler is fitted for interceptor variants of the Mosquito fighter craft. TR use only.

4000.name: P2-120 HEAT
4000.description: The P2-120 HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. TR use only.

804263.name: Skywall Shield Emitter
804263.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage. NC only.

6005433.name: M60-G Bulldog
6005433.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6009001.name: Mauler Cannon
6009001.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

75034.name: NS-15M1
75034.description: Built off of the NS-11, the NS-15M1 is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that performs well in most combat situations. The M1 was accidentally manufactured with a deep black paint, making it somewhat of a collectors item on Auraxis.

7174.name: AF-4A Bandit
7174.description: Designed with mobility in mind, the lightweight alloys that make up Auraxis Firearm's AF-A4 Bandit allows for faster movement while aiming without compromising on stopping power in close to medium ranges.

802921.name: NS-AM7G Archer
802921.description: The Archer anti-materiel rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to counter the heavily armored MAX, providing an effective option at range for dealing with the unique threat of the exo-suits.

6002874.name: TAR-AE
6002874.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition of the Terran Assault Rifle credits many victories to its incredible hip fire accuracy and high rate of fire. TR use only.

1252.name: Nano-Armor Kit 2
1252.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

1257.name: Nano-Armor Kit 3
1257.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

5443.name: Dual-75 Duster
5443.description: The Duster is equipped with dual 75mm cannons that are able to quickly unload its ten round magazine. Each shot decreases accuracy unless given time to recover; this allows the D-75 to feather accurate shots or bombard a wider area by unloading.

6009004.name: Mauler Cannon
6009004.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

2806.name: M12 Kobalt
2806.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005332.name: VE-H Maw AE
6005332.description: Advanced cooling techniques provide the Maw LMG with a decisive mix of reload speed and stopping power, offering flexibility in many combat scenarios. VS use only.

17004.name: NS-10 Burster
17004.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. VS use only.

75519.name: TR Patriot Flare Gun
75519.description: The TR Patriot Flare Gun fires a variety of red flares. TR use only.

803613.name: Sunderer Garage
803613.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer. VS use only.

2879.name: M40 Fury
2879.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

7255.name: T16 Rhino
7255.description: The T16 Rhino was designed as a squad support weapon that remains accurate, even during sustained fire. TR use only.

6004209.name: MGR-M1 Bishop
6004209.description: The Bishop marksman rifle uses signature ammunition coupled with advanced charge coils to pierce through multiple targets in a single shot. In addition, its heavy damage and controllability make it ideal for long-range engagements. NC use only.

6118.name: E540 Halberd-H
6118.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85mm armor-piercing rockets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005474.name: M20 Drake
6005474.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

7400.name: TX2 Emperor
7400.description: A popular sidearm amongst TR soldiers, the high-capacity TX2 Emperor has been in service for over 200 years. TR use only.

6004413.name: NS-61 "Ivory" Emissary
6004413.description: The fully automatic NS-61G Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. This variant of the NS-61 features a stylish gold finish. All factions can use this weapon.

6050.name: Decoy Grenade
6050.description:
This grenade simulates the sound of weapons fire, projects a false radar signature to enemies and will also distract automated anti-infantry turrets.

Lasts for 8 seconds.

6005425.name: MANA Anti-Vehicle Turret
6005425.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.

802100.name: NS-11CB
802100.description: A popular choice among Engineers and Light Assaults, the NS-11CB is an accurate and stable all-around performer. This variant of the 11C has a black metal finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

1899.name: Tempest
1899.description: Custom-built for Sigma Squad's infamous Hossin Rebirth mission, the unique Tempest SMG performs similar as a carbine at long distances.

6005515.name: Hardlight Barrier
6005515.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. This barrier can co-exist alongside a deployed Reserve Hardlight Barrier.

5514.name: M60-A Bulldog
5514.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

432.name: C-4
432.description:
Plastic explosives capable of incredible damage to infantry, MAXes, and vehicles alike.

Use Aim to throw a brick of C-4 and hold Fire to detonate.

804267.name: Structure Shield Module
804267.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. TR only.

6008750.name: M20 Basilisk
6008750.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.

2309.name: Heartstring
2309.description: The powerful Heartstring Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

4003.name: G30 Walker
4003.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft.  TR use only.

6116.name: M40 Fury-H
6116.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

6556.name: Hellion G20
6556.description: The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.

3156.name: L100 Python HEAT
3156.description: The Python HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

481.name: Recon Detection Device 2
481.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.

6004292.name: Flail Targeting Dart
6004292.description: The Flail Targeting Dart fires a dart projectile that can be targeted by the Flail. The projecitles of each tool is linked to and can only be targeted by the Flail it is pulled from.

802104.name: NS-15MG
802104.description: The gold finish on the NS-15MG has cemented it as a status symbol among soldiers on Auraxis. Good looks aside, the 15MG is an accurate all-arounder that performs well in many combat situations. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005451.name: Lumine Edge AE
6005451.description: Although slower than the VS standard issue Force-Blade, when wielded this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. VS use only.

2810.name: M20 Basilisk
2810.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

727.name: Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Turret
727.description: The Aspis Phalanx Turret rapidly fires 20mm shells that create a burst of flak when within proximity of hostile aircraft.

4746.name: Hornet Missiles
4746.description: The Hornet Missiles are laser guided and will fly towards the pilot's crosshairs.  NC use only.

6005652.name: Pillbox
6005652.description: Small fortified structure that can provide cover for both infantry and deployed equipment.

25004.name: RAMS .50M
25004.description: Chambered for the powerful 12.7x75mm round, the high muzzle velocity and stopping power afforded by the RAMS .50M ensures shots will hit harder and faster than others in its class. TR use only.

26002.name: Phantom VA23
26002.description: Recoil dampeners throughout the hefty Phantom VA23 make pulling off medium-range follow up shots effortless. VS use only.

881.name: Sticky Grenade
881.description:
A Frag Grenade coated in a kinetic adhesive, allowing it to stick to almost any surface upon impact.

3 second fuse.

3406.name: G40-F Ranger
3406.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. VS use only.

376.name: Ammunition Package 1
376.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

15001.name: M3 Pounder HEG
15001.description: The M3 Pounder fires High Explosive Grenade rounds that have a devastating effect on enemy armor. TR use only.

3090.name: G40-F Ranger
3090.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6005546.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6005546.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

6008751.name: M20 Basilisk
6008751.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.

1959.name: The Immortal
1959.description: Commissioned by the undying founder of the Vanu Sovereignty for use as his own personal sidearm, Briggs' variant of the Beamer, The Immortal, features an integrated suppressor that retains stopping power even at a distance.

4016.name: P2-120-R HEAT
4016.description: The P2-120-R HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. TR use only.

5511.name: M20 Drake
5511.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005228.name: Ammunition Package 4
6005228.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

803798.name: AE Medical Applicator 2
803798.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

75287.name: Motion Spotter 3
75287.description: While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 40 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 180 seconds, three can be carried.

3.description: The AF-19 Mercenary became the standard issue carbine for the NC due to its low production costs. It features controllable recoil that makes it effective at close to medium ranges. NC use only.
3.name: AF-19 Mercenary

15025.name: M2 Mutilator
15025.description: The M2's increased ammo capacity has proven itself as a boon to small or stranded squads. TR use only.

1278.name: Ammunition Package 6
1278.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6003173.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
6003173.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

19.name: Force-Blade
19.description: The Vanu Sovereignty's Force Blade emits highly charged particles from its cutting edge which are extremely destructive to organic tissue.

6005485.name: M60-A Bulldog
6005485.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

1618.name: Medical Applicator 3
1618.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

5496.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
5496.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

7172.name: Gauss Compact S
7172.description: The NC2S Gauss Compact possesses a select-fire mode that further diversifies the usage of the already adaptable carbine. NC use only.

16004.name: NS-10 Burster
16004.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. NC use only.

803033.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803033.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

803434.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower
803434.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

6005375.name: Medical Applicator 4
6005375.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6005424.name: Anti-Vehicle MANA Turret
6005424.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target.

2804.name: M20 Basilisk
2804.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

803779.name: T7 Mini-Chaingun AE
803779.description: The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads. TR use only.

5206.description: The L-30R Vektor is accurate but slow firing and can pierce all types of armor. All factions can use this weapon.
5206.name: L-30R Vektor

201.name: Anti-Infantry MANA Turret
201.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-infantry machine gun turret. It is equipped with a projectile shield that protects the operator from forward facing threats.

6005968.name: NSX-A Kappa
6005968.description: A precursor to the Tengu SMG, the NSX Kappa spits out three heavy pellets per shot, and was the first SMG to integrate a smart choke system that tightens pellet spread while aiming down sights.

28005.name: SMG-46G Armistice
28005.description: The SMG-46 Armistice fully automatic submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.

6004010.name: Artemis VX26 AE
6004010.description: The fully automatic Artemis VX26 scout rifle is capable of quickly dispatching enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.

5212.name: A30 Walker
5212.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6009000.name: Flash XS-1
6009000.description:
Single use consumable. Carry up to 2 on the field between resupplies. 40 max.
The Flash XS-1 is a lightly armored, single-passenger vehicle designed for rapid deployment anywhere on the battlefield.

3087.name: G40-F Ranger
3087.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7358.name: AF-18 Stalker
7358.description: The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.

803807.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 4
803807.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

1919.name: Eclipse VE3A
1919.description: The Eclipse easily overshadows its predecessor, the Solstice, as a close-quarters combat king. It comes equipped with an underbarrel plasma shotgun for ambushes and last-ditch scenarios.

316.name: NS-15MP
316.description: This platinum variant of the remarkably accurate NS-15M LMG provides excellent sustained fire and above average projectile speed. All factions can use NS weapons.

7253.name: T9 CARV-S
7253.description: This special, versatile variant of the CARV can adapt to nearly any situation thanks to its multiple firing modes and wide range of attachments. Compared to its predecessor, it features a slightly slower rate of fire and more controllable recoil. TR use only.

6006685.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 4
6006685.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

7519.name: Nebula VM20
7519.description: The Nebula VM20's overclocked power core interface allows for a rapid rate of fire to quickly dispatch enemy infantry in close quarters. VS use only.

5214.name: A30 Walker
5214.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

25000.name: M77-B
25000.description: The versatile M77-B's balance of stopping power, accuracy, and rate of fire make it an excellent choice for Infiltrators that have been provided with limited information for a mission. TR use only.

6002399.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Turret
6002399.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

802102.name: NS-11CG
802102.description: The opulent NS-11CG is a variant of the 11C, a carbine well known for its stability and all-around performance. The 11CG is also known for all that, as well as looking good. All factions can use NS weapons.

40001.name: GD-66 Claw
40001.description: Genudine Dynamics released the highly mobile Claw GD-66 shotgun early in the 29th century. Its lightweight action allows for a higher rate of fire than other pump-action shotguns on the market. NC use only.

6009023.name: Bastion CDWS
6009023.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6005634.name: Blast Wall
6005634.description: Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.

6008929.name: Bastion Battery
6008929.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

17013.name: Comet VM2
17013.description: The Comet VM2 is the standard-issue anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. The explosive plasma orbs it fires are capable of melting through heavy tank armor. VS use only.

804270.name: Repair Module
804270.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. TR use only.

6005496.name: Hellion G20
6005496.description: The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.

6005463.name: AP30 Shredder
6005463.description: The AP30 Shredder machine gun is capable of inflicting sustained and accurate damage with its 30mm armor piercing rounds.  All factions can use this weapon.

6004869.name: WLT-ARX Mining Laser
6004869.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

478.name: Recon Detection Device 3
478.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.75 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.

6123.name: Enforcer ML65-H
6123.description: The Enforcer ML85 fires magnetically propelled HEAT darts, suited for sustained damage in mid-range combat scenarios. NC use only.

5513.name: A30 Walker
5513.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6006607.name: AE Medical Applicator 2
6006607.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6009024.name: Bastion CDWS
6009024.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6002745.name: RAMS-AE .50M
6002745.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition of the RAMS .50 harnesses high muzzle velocity and stopping power to hit harder and faster than other sniper rifles in its class. TR use only.

804720.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804720.description: This black right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

804265.name: Skywall Shield Emitter
804265.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage. VS only.

5226.name: C150 Dalton
5226.description: The C150 Dalton fires 150mm Armor Piercing Anti-Tank rounds that inflict massive damage in a single shot. All factions can use this weapon.

804872.name: RD-GG Recon Device
804872.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3.25 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.

46.name: Shield Recharging Field
46.description:
Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 5 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.

6006063.name: M202 Wyrm
6006063.description: The M202 Wyrm wing-mounted machine guns fire slow, high-damage rounds most effective against heavily armored land and air vehicles.

75234.name: NS-11CP
75234.description: The NS-11CP's compact frame makes it a viable close range option over its predecessor, the NS-11P, and just as effective as the original NS-11C.  All factions can use NS weapons.

803791.name: AE Medical Applicator 5
803791.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6009017.name: Bastion CIWS
6009017.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

7150.name: Equinox VE2 Burst
7150.description: Vanu Esamir Labs created the Equinox VE2 Burst to provide easily controllable burst fire for distant targets. VS use only.

4009.name: P2-120 HESH
4009.description: The P2-120 HESH is loaded with high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, but more lethal to enemy infantry. TR use only.

6005476.name: M20 Drake
6005476.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6006092.name: LA3 "Jackpot" Desperado
6006092.description: The 2-round burst LA3 Desperado can quickly eliminate targets at close range. NC use only.

1253.name: Nano-Armor Kit 3
1253.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

801970.name: NS CandyCannon 3000
801970.description: Originally designed as an office toy for long-range candy corn deliveries, Nanite Systems' Indar office branch quickly went out of business after the public experienced firsthand the folly of firing the world's hardest substance out of a 'toy' gun.

268.description: The Lancer AE's particle accelerator is capable of firing a focused, high-velocity anti-armor projectile with pinpoint accuracy. The weapon has three charge-levels which increases damage and ammunition used. VS use only.
268.name: Lancer AE

802517.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802517.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

6003752.name: NSX-P Tanto
6003752.description: This platinum variant of the NSX Tanto is a powerful, lightweight carbine which combines precision with versatility, and is most effective in short bursts. All factions can use NS weapons.

6006174.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6006174.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

24007.name: AF-6 Shadow
24007.description: The AF-6 Shadow is a semi-automatic scout rifle purpose-built for closer effective ranges than sniper rifles. NC use only.

7194.name: HC1 Cougar
7194.description: The Terran Republic's Heavy Carbine project resulted in the HC1 Cougar. Utilizing a higher caliber cartridge than its LC cousins, the Cougar possesses unparalleled stopping power amongst other Terran carbines up to medium range.

6006398.name: Halberd SE
6006398.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

5252.name: L105 Zephyr PX
5252.description: The L105 Zephyr PX fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

884.name: Nanite Revive Grenade
884.description:
Upon detonation, this Revive Grenade releases a swarm of Rebirth nanites capable of healing fallen allies to 50% health.

2.5 second fuse.

1044.name: Bouncing Betty
1044.description: A New Conglomerate anti-personnel Bouncing Betty that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.

6006080.name: Fatestealer
6006080.description: Despite the visible age of this ornate relic, the blade remains sharp to the touch. You feel that this dagger has taken many lives, possibly prior to the Auraxian war.

5500.name: M20 Drake
5500.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6003405.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6003405.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

6009058.name: Aux Spitfire
6009058.description: Deployable turret identical to an engineer Spitfire Auto-Turret. Only one Aux Spitfire can be active at a time. An engineer can place their standard spitfire and one Aux Spitfire at the same time.

802106.name: NS-15M2
802106.description: Built off of the NS-11, the NS-15M2 is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that leaves little downtime during reloads. Its reputation as a reliable all-arounder makes it suitable for many types of combat situations. All factions can use NS weapons.

6006091.name: TX2 "Jackpot" Emperor
6006091.description: A popular sidearm amongst TR soldiers, the high-capacity TX2 Emperor has been in service for over 200 years. TR use only.

804980.name: Blast Wall
804980.description: Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.

2312.name: NS-30B Vandal
2312.description: Thanks to its lightweight frame and stabilized barrel, the NS-30 Vandal scout rifle features accurate fire and superior mobility while aimed, making it a common choice for aggressive, mid-range infiltration.

803801.name: AE Medical Applicator 5
803801.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

7507.name: AF-23 Grinder
7507.description: Auraxis Firearms' first venture into MAX weaponry was the AF-23 Grinder. It features an extended ammo reserve for sustained fire. NC use only.

6005466.name: L105 Zephyr
6005466.description: The L105 Zephyr fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

1894.name: Betelgeuse 54-A
1894.description: Orion's largest star also shines brightly as a powerful, accurate LMG capable of sustained suppressing fire. Plagued by multiple redesigns during its troubled development, the third and final iteration proved itself as a favorite amongst the VS.

803790.name: AE Medical Applicator 4
803790.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

3704.name: Enforcer ML85
3704.description: The Enforcer ML85 fires magnetically propelled HEAT darts, suited for sustained damage in mid-range combat scenarios. NC use only.

6005233.name: G30 Walker
6005233.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6003604.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003604.description: The right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

33003.name: AF-22 Crow
33003.description: Auraxis Firearms' first infantry-based rocket launcher introduces anti-armor lockon capabilities, complemented by a powerful warhead, as well as the ability to dumbfire the weapon against enemy infantry and air. NC use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>

2318.name: Hunter QCX-G
2318.description: The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

6003879.name: MG-S1 Jackal
6003879.description: The adaptable Jackal SMG has high stopping power in close quarters while remaining easy to control. TR use only.

502.name: MANA Anti-Vehicle Turret
502.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.

804878.name: RD-GG Recon Device 3
804878.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.75 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.

3102.name: C75 Viper
3102.description: The C75 is able to rapid fire six 75mm HEAT shells.  The damage potential is great when all shells hit their target, but the cannon is unstable when firing at the maximum rate. All factions can use this weapon.

7151.name: Equinox VE2
7151.description: The versatile Equinox VE2 assault rifle was designed to perform well in many situations. VS use only.

705.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
705.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

2311.name: NS-30 Vandal
2311.description: Thanks to its lightweight frame and stabilized barrel, the NS-30 Vandal scout rifle features accurate fire and superior mobility while aimed, making it a common choice for aggressive, mid-range infiltration.

6008644.name: NSX "Ivory" Naginata
6008644.description: The Naginata light machine gun can maintain rounds on medium ranged targets without releasing the trigger, but quickly loses that benefit while moving. All factions can use NS weapons.

27000.name: AF-4 Cyclone
27000.description: The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.

309.name: Recon Detection Device 1
309.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.

1254.name: Nano-Armor Kit 4
1254.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6115.name: M40 Fury-H
6115.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

4007.name: P525 Marauder
4007.description: The P525 Marauder fires 40mm high explosive grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. TR use only.

6002497.name: Light Air Terminal
6002497.description: The Light Air Terminal can be used to spawn light aircraft such as ESFs and Valkyries at the cost of Cortium.

6002852.name: H-V45 AE
6002852.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition H-V45 was created with a focus on close quarters mobility. Its light weight does not slow the shooter as much as other weapons in its class. VS use only.

6008669.name: NSX "Networked" Tomoe
6008669.description: Focusing on high rate of fire and deadly precision, Tomoe rewards headhunters, making it a desirable option for mid-range assassinations. All factions can use NS weapons.

4015.name: E540 Halberd
4015.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. TR use only.

3700.name: Titan-150 HEAT
3700.description: The Titan-150 HEAT is loaded with high-explosive anti-tank rounds that reload quickly and have balanced effectiveness against enemy armor and personnel. NC use only.

803617.name: HIVE
803617.description: While active, Hardline Interference Volume Emitters house cores which contribute to continent control in exchange for Cortium.

2875.name: M40 Fury
2875.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

802584.name: Icikill
802584.description: Though no doubt a top candidate for Auraxis' most unconventional weapon, the supercooled crystalline Icikill knife will chill both spines and nearby organs after coming in contact with them.

803810.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 2
803810.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

75171.name: NS-357G Underboss
75171.description: Chambered for the powerful .357 magnum cartridge, the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than its bigger NS-44 brother. All factions can use this weapon.

15030.name: MRC3 Mercy
15030.description: Ironically nicknamed "Mercy," the latest iteration of the accurate Mobile Rotary Cannon can drop enemy infantry at a distance. TR use only.

880.name: Sticky Grenade
880.description:
A Frag Grenade coated in a kinetic adhesive, allowing it to stick to almost any surface upon impact.

3 second fuse.

6003601.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003601.description: The left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

803590.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803590.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

804721.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804721.description: This black left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

78.description: The NC6 Gauss SAW's low production cost, reliability, and sheer stopping power lead to wide-spread adoption of the weapon in the Auraxian War's early years. NC use only.
78.name: NC6 Gauss SAW

6113.name: M60-G Bulldog-H
6113.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

7254.name: MSW-R
7254.description: The MSW-R was designed to meet the needs of mobile Terran Republic shock troopers. Its light weight and fast reload time allows forward soldiers to push forward without stopping. TR use only.

6005541.name: WLT-Weaver Mining Turret
6005541.description: This nose-mounted mining turret can fire heavy machine gun rounds with its primary fire, and harvest cortium from long range with its mining laser alternate fire.

803484.name: M12 Kobalt
803484.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005427.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
6005427.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

16024.name: AF-34 Mattock
16024.description: The AF-34 Mattock features increased effective range in comparison to the other MAX anti-infantry weapons. NC use only.

7402.name: T4 AMP
7402.description: The Terran Republic's Automatic Machine Pistol functions similarly to an SMG thanks to its lightning-fast, fully automatic fire.

802733.name: NS-44L Blackhand
802733.description: With an extended barrel and integrated scope the NS-44L Blackhand provides significant advantages over similar pistols when engaging threats at longer ranges.

1275.name: Ammunition Package 3
1275.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

803806.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 6
803806.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

6005219.name: Nano-Armor Kit 3
6005219.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

3084.name: G30 Walker
3084.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

5051.name: Hornet Missiles
5051.description: The Hornet Missiles are laser guided and will fly towards the pilot's crosshairs.  TR use only.

6557.name: Hellion G20
6557.description: The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.

3108.name: Skyguard
3108.description: The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

804886.name: RD-GG Recon Device 6
804886.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.

6004531.name: Reserve Hardlight Barrier
6004531.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. Only one barricade may be active at a time.

804884.name: RD-GG Recon Device 5
804884.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.25 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

15.description: The reliable TX1 Repeater is the latest iteration of a firearm design stretching back 300 years. Its 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. TR use only.
15.name: TX1 Repeater

75268.name: NS-357P Underboss
75268.description: This platinum variant of the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than the bigger NS-44 Commissioner.  All factions can use NS weapons.

6005462.name: Dual-75 Duster
6005462.description: The Duster is equipped with dual 75mm cannons that are able to quickly unload its ten round magazine. Each shot decreases accuracy unless given time to recover; this allows the D-75 to feather accurate shots or bombard a wider area by unloading.

6005382.name: M40 Fury-H
6005382.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

5208.description: The L-30R Vektor is accurate but slow firing and can pierce all types of armor. All factions can use this weapon.
5208.name: L-30R Vektor

5517.name: A30 Walker
5517.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7236.name: LA1 Anchor
7236.description: The LA1 Anchor is tuned for close quarters effectiveness. It features high damage, moderate rate of fire, advanced laser attachments, and a 50 round box magazine for quick combat reloads. NC use only.

4903.name: Hellfire Rocket Pods
4903.description: Hellfire Rocket Pods fire a volley of up to 16 unguided, high-explosive rockets. TR use only.

6119.name: E540 Halberd-H
6119.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85mm armor-piercing rockets. All factions can use this weapon.

804272.name: Turret AI Module
804272.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. NC use only.

803616.name: Bunker
803616.description: Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.

6005490.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
6005490.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

803796.name: AE Medical Applicator 5
803796.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6005191.name: Rocklet Rifle
6005191.description:
The Rocklet Rifle fires munitions that auto-det on aircraft or pierce enemy ground vehicle armor. Alternate rocklet types may be loaded into the weapon.

Press Aim Down Sights to fire a rocklet barrage.

1270.name: Ammunition Package 3
1270.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

1621.name: Medical Applicator 6
1621.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6005236.name: G40-F Ranger
6005236.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6005299.name: L100 Python AP
6005299.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

7278.name: Ursa
7278.description: The Ursa features manageable recoil and a high velocity projectile, making it extremely effective at ranges beyond that of other LMGs. VS use only.

3709.name: E540 Halberd
3709.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. NC use only.

6002362.name: Lumifiber Rampart Wall
6002362.description: Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.

6002943.name: NS-AM7 AE/NC Archer
6002943.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition Archer anti-material rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to dispatch MAX-based threats at medium to long range.

17030.name: Blueshift VM5
17030.description: The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.

2808.name: M12 Kobalt
2808.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005234.name: G30 Walker
6005234.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

85.description: The ML-7 launches unguided rockets that are effective against both infantry and armor. TR use only.
85.name: ML-7

804722.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804722.description: This black right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

803493.name: M40 Fury
803493.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

34002.name: T2 Striker
34002.description: The dumbfire-capable T2 Striker houses a six-round magazine of compact, heat-seeking rockets that will home in when within proximity of enemy aircraft. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Proximity Seeking: Aircraft</font>

3158.name: L100 Python HEAT
3158.description: The Python HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

2657.name: S12 Renegade
2657.description: The S12 Renegade is an effective shotgun that is lethal to soft targets at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6009101.name: NS-30 Tranquility
6009101.description: Heavy modification has reclassified this NS-30 Vandal as a "non-lethal rifle," capable of firing concussive smart-slugs that slow enemy infantry on impact. While less powerful than the original, the Tranquility boasts higher projectile velocities, and remains suppressed at all times.

6002484.name: Vehicle Ammo Dispenser
6002484.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity.

7214.name: Serpent VE92
7214.description: The Serpent VE92's overclocked power core interface allows for an extremely high rate of fire, making it a lethal opponent in close quarters combat. VS use only.

5221.name: M60-A Bulldog
5221.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

7495.name: NS-7B PDW
7495.description: This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a sleek black finish.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.

27005.name: AF-4G Cyclone
27005.description: The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.

15012.name: M1 Heavy Cycler
15012.description: Originally developed as a stationary turret, the MAX-mounted, multi-barreled M1 Heavy Cycler is capable of shredding apart entire squads without needing to reload. TR use only.

26007.name: Nyx VX31
26007.description: Created for spec-ops missions where sniper rifles would prove unsuitable, the powerful semi-automatic Nyx VX31 scout rifle excels at medium range. VS use only.

2508.name: M20 Basilisk-F
2508.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6008687.name: Defector Claws
6008687.description: Jagged metal hands make for good weaponry against the average Auraxian.

702.name: Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Turret
702.description: The Aspis Phalanx Turret rapidly fires 20mm shells that create a burst of flak when within proximity of hostile aircraft.

100.name: Medical Kit
100.description: This single-use Medical Kit instantly restores 500 health via needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

6005372.name: Medical Applicator 1
6005372.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6009040.name: Bastion Battery

803026.name: AV SpitFire Turret

6005168.description: The M12 Kobalt is a 50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

7173.name: Razor GD-23
7173.description: Genudine Dynamics unveiled the Razor GD-23 in the early 29th century. The Razor quickly became popular due to its high accuracy and controllable recoil, allowing it to outperform other carbines at long distances. NC use only.

17025.name: Cosmos VM3
17025.description: A late successor to the Quasar VM1, the Cosmos uses experimental plasma containment technology, resulting in larger rounds. These large plasma rounds cause less cranial trauma, but are significantly easier to strike mobile targets with. VS use only.

6005232.name: M20 Basilisk

1974.description: The TRs' Bighorn .50M surpassed the RAMS as the heaviest sniper rifle in their arsenal. Boasting an unmatched bullet velocity and a straight-pull bolt for rapid shots, the deafening crack of the Bighorn is a warning to distant soldiers.

Longer distance strikes cost additional charge, so frequent or long distance attacks will require longer term defense of the structure.

5509.name: M20 Drake

6003571.name: NS-11A "Heatwave"

804243.description: The NSX Tanto is a powerful, lightweight carbine which combines precision with versatility, and is most effective in short bursts. All factions can use NS weapons.

2316.name: MKV-G Suppressed
2316.description: The MKV has an integrated suppressor that prevents the user from showing on the minimap when firing. It features superior bullet velocity and long range stopping power compared to SMGs using optional aftermarket suppressors.

803802.name: AE Medical Applicator 6

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 7 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.

6101.name: M12 Kobalt-H
6101.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

7235.description: The EM6's incredible adaptability on the field makes it popular among NC soldiers. NC use only.

801969.name: The Slasher
801969.description: Simple stainless steel knives haven't gone out of style as a weapon of choice for the discerning space psycho. Despite using millenia-old technology, contemporary body armor hasn't solved the problem of 'getting stabbed.'

6004448.name: The Flail

6009015.name: Bastion CIWS
