7275.description: The Pulsar Light Support Weapon (LSW) is a Pulsar variant with a high capacity battery and heavier barrel. Its reputation as a highly versatile weapon makes it a popular choice for missions where anything can happen. VS use only.

1964.name: The Kraken
1964.description: Nanite Systems' mightiest anti-tank weapon received a facelift with the release of The Kraken, a commemorative Auraxium-plated Decimator. Its powerful warheads create a miniaturized singularity upon impact.

803809.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 1
803809.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

803814.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 6
803814.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

17000.name: Quasar VM1
17000.description: The heavy Quasar VM1 was one of the earliest weapons created with discovered Vanu technology. The rapid firing plasma cannon can tear apart enemy foot soldiers with ease. VS use only.

6003967.name: Zenith VX-5AE
6003967.description: Vanu Labs' close-to-midrange Zenith VX-5 uses advanced crystalline structures to significantly reduce weight without compromising on strength. It features both precision hipfire and increased movement speed while aiming.

7101.name: Gauss Rifle Burst
7101.description: The Gauss Rifle Burst features the same versatility as the NC1, but with an easily controllable burst fire mode. NC use only.

6002390.name: Glaive IPC
6002390.description: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.

803423.name: WLT-Mandible Mining Laser
803423.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

6004168.name: T7-P Mini-Chaingun
6004168.description: The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads. TR use only.

804728.name: NS-20G Gorgon
804728.description: This gold right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005455.name: L-24R Spur
6005455.description:
The L-24R Spur is equipped with specialized optics that allow the pilot to adjust the weapons aim rather than being fixed forward.

Optics for this weapon are engaged with Weapon Optic function or Cockpit Mouse Freelook hotkeys.

3088.name: G40-F Ranger
3088.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

1273.name: Ammunition Package 6
1273.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

2800.name: M12 Kobalt
2800.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6004008.name: AF-18 Stalker AE
6004008.description: The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.

1262.name: Nano-Armor Kit 4
1262.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

75083.name: NS Baron G5
75083.description: Nanite Systems' first attempts into close-range weaponry resulted in the powerful Baron G5. The tube fed Baron is able to put down targets at longer ranges than typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.

47.name: Shield Recharging Field
47.description:
Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 5.5 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.

6004752.name: V30-F Starfall
6004752.description: The Starfall fires a quick 3 round plasma barrage, meant to strike at unsuspecting vehicles with lighting speed. VS use only.

6009019.name: Bastion CIWS
6009019.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

3756.name: 150mm Titan-R HEAT
3756.description: The Titan-150-R HEAT is loaded with high-explosive anti-tank rounds that reload quickly and have balanced effectiveness against enemy armor and personnel. NC use only.

6004744.name: Water Balloon
6004744.description:
Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Limited event item.

50560.name: NS Decimator
50560.description: Designed for raw power, the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005543.name: WLT-Weaver Mining Turret
6005543.description: This nose-mounted mining turret can fire heavy machine gun rounds with its primary fire, and harvest cortium from long range with its mining laser alternate fire.

39002.name: TAS-16 Blackjack
39002.description: The TAS-16 Blackjack boasts extremely high close quarters burst damage, even for a shotgun. TR use only.

803805.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 3
803805.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

6009069.name: Cortium Bomb
6009069.description: Deploy a powerful cortium bomb that will explode after 20 seconds, doing high damage over a large radius. Detonation is cancelled if destroyed before the timer expires. Can only deploy outside.

6005537.name: M20 Basilisk
6005537.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

13.name: Chainblade
13.description: The Chainblade knife's razor sharp teeth have proven extremely effective in close quarters combat.

73.description: The sleek, compact design of the GR-22 improves handling when firing on the move, making it an excellent choice for close quarters combat. NC use only.
73.name: GR-22

7365.name: SOAS-20
7365.description: The automatic SOAS-20's high rate of fire makes it an excellent choice for mid-range encounters. TR use only.

6008749.name: M20 Basilisk
6008749.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.

1617.name: Medical Applicator 2
1617.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6005055.name: MGR-C1 Charger
6005055.description: The Charger carbine integrates an overcharging system and unique magazine that increases the stopping power of the first few shots upon freshly reloading the weapon. NC use only.

5218.name: L-24R Spur
5218.description:
The L-24R Spur is equipped with specialized optics that allow the pilot to adjust the weapons aim rather than being fixed forward.

Optics for this weapon are engaged with Weapon Optic function or Cockpit Mouse Freelook hotkeys.

77822.name: Gauss Prime
77822.description: Released as a commemorative edition of the NC's wildly successful foray into electromagnetic weaponry, the NC1 Gauss Rifle, the Gauss Prime marksman assault rifle can effortlessly drop distant targets.

6554.name: CAS 14-E
6554.description: The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

6005544.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6005544.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

6005966.name: NSX-A Muramasa
6005966.description: Scrapped prior to release in favor of the Masamune's wire-guidance system and contextual firing modes, the NSX Muramasa can fire up to four accurate, high damage rockets either from the hip or while aiming down the optics.

2803.name: M20 Basilisk
2803.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

34004.name: ASP-30 Grounder
34004.description: The ASP-30 Grounder takes advantage of lock-on technology to quickly dispatch enemy aircraft, and can be dumbfired when encountering enemy vehicles or infantry. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Optional Lockon: Aircraft</font>

802771.name: NS-AM7 Archer
802771.description: The Archer anti-materiel rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to counter the heavily armored MAX, providing an effective option at range for dealing with the unique threat of the exo-suits.

7611.name: Restoration Kit
7611.description: This single-use Restoration Kit regenerates 70 health per second for 12 seconds through needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

6003552.name: Router
6003552.description: When placed, the Router becomes a spawn point for allies.

2658.name: S12 Renegade
2658.description: The S12 Renegade is an effective shotgun that is lethal to soft targets at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6005173.name: Recon Detection Device 5
6005173.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

5518.name: M60-A Bulldog
5518.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

3427.name: Supernova-R PC
3427.description: The Supernova-R PC quickly reloads its high-explosive anti-tank plasma charges that carry balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. VS use only.

6009006.name: Mauler Cannon
6009006.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

6006187.name: MG-A1 Arbalest
6006187.description: Designed as an alternative to the popular SABR-13 assault rifle, the Arbalest fires concentrated, 6-round bursts with low recoil and high takedown potential at mid-range. TR use only.

803793.name: AE Medical Applicator 2
803793.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

703.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
703.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

2878.name: M40 Fury
2878.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

800623.name: C-4 ARX
800623.description:
Special Auraxium-plated plastic explosives capable of incredible damage to both infantry, MAXes, and vehicles.

Use Aim to throw a brick of C-4 and hold Fire to detonate.

804179.name: NSX Masamune
804179.description: Masamune integrates contextual firemodes, allowing it to release all four rockets from the hip, or laser guide them in a burst while using the cutting edge tracking optics. All players can use NS weapons.

4304.name: Maelstrom Turbo Laser
4304.description: The Maelstrom is a high damage, fast firing nose cannon which tears apart enemy fighters at close range. VS use only.

5521.name: A30 Walker
5521.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6002496.name: Light Air Terminal
6002496.description: The Light Air Terminal can be used to spawn light aircraft such as ESFs and Valkyries at the cost of Cortium.

6005227.name: Ammunition Package 3
6005227.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6008686.name: Grenade Printer
6008686.description: Wrist-mounted nano-printers replenish explosives periodically, and require cooldown when overheated.

6004118.name: VE-H Maw
6004118.description: Advanced cooling techniques provide the Maw LMG with a decisive mix of reload speed and stopping power, offering flexibility in many combat scenarios. VS use only.

803612.name: Sunderer Garage
803612.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer. TR use only.

4010.name: G40-F Ranger
4010.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft.  TR use only.

6005642.name: Vehicle Gate
6005642.description: Vehicle Gates are large walls with an opening wide enough for vehicles to pass through; when combined with a Structure Shield Module the opening will be sealed with an energy shield that will block enemy vehicles and large projectiles.

6005454.name: L-30R Vektor
6005454.description: The L-30R Vektor is accurate but slow firing and can pierce all types of armor. All factions can use this weapon.

3703.name: G30 Walker
3703.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. NC use only.

3103.name: L100 Python AP
3103.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

16001.name: NCM2 Falcon
16001.description: The NCM2 Falcon is the standard for the NC's anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. It features powerful warheads capable of heavily damaging enemy vehicles and MAXes alike. NC use only.

6005622.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
6005622.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

24000.name: Gauss SPR
24000.description: The semi-automatic Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) is a marksman rifle built on the highly-configurable Gauss platform. Developed after the start of the Auraxis War, it has remained in use due to its accuracy when making long-distance shots. NC use only.

802875.name: MR11 Gatekeeper-H
802875.description: Based on a modified Fracture design, the Gatekeeper retains the feel of its forerunner but incorprorates a faster fire rate and projectile speed while increasing overall accuracy. TR use only.

5251.name: L105 Zephyr PX
5251.description: The L105 Zephyr PX fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

125.name: Nano-Armor Kit 1
125.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6006090.name: "Jackpot" Cerberus
6006090.description: The Cerberus is able to fire overcharged rounds that are highly damaging in close range. VS use only.

5223.name: M60-A Bulldog
5223.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

2317.name: Hunter QCX-B
2317.description: The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

6008684.name: LB00 Python AP
6008684.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

804257.name: NSX Tengu
804257.description: The playful Tengu SMG scatters four pellets per shot, and narrows its pellet spread while aiming down sights. All factions can use NS weapons.

7518.name: MRC3 Mercy
7518.description: Ironically nicknamed "Mercy," the latest iteration of the accurate Mobile Rotary Cannon can drop enemy infantry at a distance. TR use only.

202.name: Anti-Infantry MANA Turret
202.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-infantry machine gun turret. It is equipped with a projectile shield that protects the operator from forward facing threats.

6006682.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 1
6006682.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

41000.name: Pandora VX25
41000.description: The Pandora VX25 automatic plasma shotgun is capable of rapidly eliminating opponents in close quarters. VS use only.

6005110.name: VE-C Horizon
6005110.description: Horizon's experimental design fires a fan of three projectiles on a horizontal trajectory when hipfiring, and a tighter, vertical trajectory when aiming. Each plasma projection packs less firepower than the average carbine individually, but when all projections land, the stopping power rivals that of harder hitting weapons. VS use only.

6002468.name: Elysium Spawn Tube
6002468.description: When powered by an adjacent silo the Elysium Spawn Tube will provide a spawn point for nearby allies at the cost of a small amount of Cortium each spawn. Additionally, it includes a binding option, allowing those linked to it to spawn at it from anywhere on the continent. You can only bind to one point at a time.

803491.name: M40 Fury
803491.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

6004144.name: Lasher X2-P
6004144.description: The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.

804954.name: Faction Banner
804954.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.

6002451.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
6002451.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

804656.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804656.description: The left handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6111.name: G40-F Ranger
6111.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

803497.name: WLT-Yellowjacket Mining Laser
803497.description: This top-mounted mining laser allows a gunner to quickly harvest additional Cortium and siege enemy structures, but sacrifices defensive capabilities to do so.

803488.name: G40-F Ranger
803488.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

15000.name: M1 Heavy Cycler
15000.description: Originally developed as a stationary turret, the MAX-mounted, multi-barreled M1 Heavy Cycler is capable of shredding apart entire squads without needing to reload. TR use only.

2832.name: M60-G Bulldog
2832.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

2509.name: M20 Basilisk-F
2509.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

803601.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower
803601.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

6002479.name: Pillbox
6002479.description: Small fortified structure that can provide cover for both infantry and deployed equipment.

1266.name: Ammunition Package 4
1266.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6009030.name: Twin-Saron LC
6009030.description: The Twin-Saron is a high-capacity variant of the standard issue Saron Laser Cannon, meant for use with interceptor variants of the Scythe. VS use only.

75521.name: VS Patriot Flare Gun
75521.description: The VS Patriot Flare Gun fires a variety of purple flares. VS use only.

804982.name: Blast Wall
804982.description: Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.

804885.name: RD-GG Recon Device 6
804885.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.

6009021.name: Bastion CIWS
6009021.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

44605.name: Frag Grenade
44605.description:
The standard Terran Republic frag grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.

7494.name: NS-7 PDW
7494.description: This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.

5512.name: A30 Walker
5512.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

882.name: Sticky Grenade
882.description:
A Frag Grenade coated in a kinetic adhesive, allowing it to stick to almost any surface upon impact.

3 second fuse.

5507.name: M20 Drake
5507.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

16012.name: NCM1 Scattercannon
16012.description: The arm-mounted NCM1 Scattercannon functions as a semi-automatic shotgun capable of cutting through enemy squads. NC use only.

804266.name: Structure Shield Module
804266.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. NC only.

6005453.name: Carver AE
6005453.description: Although slower than the NC standard issue Mag-Cutter, when wielded, this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. NC use only.

804741.name: NS-10B Burster
804741.description: This black, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

804955.name: Faction Banner
804955.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.

6008654.name: NSX "Ivory" Tomoe
6008654.description: Focusing on high rate of fire and deadly precision, Tomoe rewards headhunters, making it a desirable option for mid-range assassinations. All factions can use NS weapons.

6002405.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Turret
6002405.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

804960.name: NS-44LP Blackhand
804960.description: With an extended barrel and integrated scope this platinum version of the NS-44L Blackhand provides significant advantages over other pistols when engaging threats at longer ranges. All factions can use this weapon.

2313.name: NS-30G Vandal
2313.description: Thanks to its lightweight frame and stabilized barrel, the NS-30 Vandal scout rifle features accurate fire and superior mobility while aimed, making it a common choice for aggressive, mid-range infiltration.

700.name: Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Turret
700.description: The Aspis Phalanx Turret rapidly fires 20mm shells that create a burst of flak when within proximity of hostile aircraft.

6005241.name: M60-G Bulldog
6005241.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

804717.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804717.description: This black left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

1610.name: Medical Applicator 4
1610.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6006608.name: AE Medical Applicator 3
6006608.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

5522.name: M60-A Bulldog
5522.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

271.description: Although slower than the NC standard issue Mag-Cutter, when wielded, this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. NC use only.
271.name: Carver

7149.name: CME
7149.description: The CME's high projectile velocity and good accuracy make it a very effective weapon at medium and long ranges. VS use only.

6107.name: G30 Walker
6107.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7432.name: TS4 Haymaker
7432.description: The powerful TS4 Haymaker features a large magazine, allowing for sustained fire without needing to reload. TR use only.

6004218.name: MGR-L1 Promise
6004218.description: The Promise LMG's large magazine and high rate of fire are complemented by in-built counterweights for sustained accuracy. NC use only.

804246.name: NSX Yumi
804246.description: The Yumi burst rifle is capable of, after a short delay, unleashing a rapid five round volley. With proper shot placement, Yumi can strike down mid-range targets more quickly than most weapons in its class. All factions can use NS weapons.

6006188.name: VE-A Lacerta
6006188.description: The Lacerta assault rifle syncs an accurate, three round burst to a moderate refire rate, and creates a melodic barrage of plasma, perfect for mid-range engagements. VS use only.

803028.name: AV SpitFire Turret
803028.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

6005240.name: M12 Kobalt
6005240.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6003738.name: Nano-Repair Grenade
6003738.description:
When detonated, the grenade creates a field that repairs nearby mechanical targets for 50 health per second. This grenade can stick to vehicles and MAX units.

Lasts for 10 seconds.

804718.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804718.description: This black right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005969.name: NSX-A Yawara
6005969.description: During focus group testing, the compact, automatic, NSX Yawara pistol was overlooked at nearly every turn, failing to reach the popularity of the numerous other Nanite Systems pistol designs released throughout the Auraxian War.

1264.name: Ammunition Package 2
1264.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

803030.name: AV SpitFire Turret
803030.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

1979.name: Parsec VX3-A
1979.description: Built from a highly-tinkered Parallax, the Parsec was the brainchild of a small group of engineers looking for long-range perfection. Though significantly louder than most sniper rifles, it drops targets before the sound wave even reaches them.

6005222.name: Nano-Armor Kit 6
6005222.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

555.name: MANA Anti-Personnel Turret
555.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Personnel turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against soft and medium armored targets.

6559.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6559.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

6005049.name: MG-C1 Kindred
6005049.description: The Kindred carbine fires high caliber rounds quickly on trigger press, and then settles into a more rhythmic firing rate after a short time. For TR use only.

6002392.name: Glaive IPC
6002392.description: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.

475.name: Recon Detection Device 4
475.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.5 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

6008665.name: NSX "Networked" Yumi
6008665.description: The Yumi burst rifle is capable of, after a short delay, unleashing a rapid five round volley. With proper shot placement, Yumi can strike down mid-range targets more quickly than most weapons in its class. All factions can use NS weapons.

803470.name: Welding Device
803470.description:
The Welding Device can repair construction objects; despawn constructs you or your squad mates have placed; and despawn any construction object within your Silo's sphere of influence.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

4602.name: Tomcat A2AM Pods
4602.description: After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. NC use only.

75490.name: NS Patriot Flare Gun
75490.description: The NS Patriot Flare Gun fires flares of all shapes and colors. All factions can use this weapon.

6006285.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6006285.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

6004427.name: Routing Spire
6004427.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that, when powered, houses a spawnpoint Router. All Factions can use this item.

6005263.name: Medical Kit
6005263.description: This single-use Medical Kit instantly restores 500 health via needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

804719.name: NS-20B Gorgon
804719.description: This black left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

1934.name: Havoc
1934.description: The TR's infamous Havoc Squad popularized this shotgun loadout enough to have it put into production. Primarily used with behind-the-lines galaxy drops to secure CCs, the Havoc can clear rooms and hold points with the best of them.

7423.name: NC12 Sweeper
7423.description: The iconic NC12 Sweeper shotgun features a high capacity magazine as well as considerable stopping power at close range. It excels in urban combat scenarios. NC use only.

725.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
725.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

803599.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower
803599.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

6009007.name: Mauler Cannon
6009007.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

556.name: MANA Anti-Personnel Turret
556.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Personnel turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against soft and medium armored targets.

6008903.name: Bastion CIWS
6008903.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

802969.name: NS-R3 Swarm
802969.description: The magazine-fed NS-R3 Swarm can switch between low velocity and high velocity rockets which lock onto both ground and air targets, allowing the user to tailor the weapon's tracking capabilities based on the engagement. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation.  Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>

6006397.name: Halberd-H SE
6006397.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

1869.name: 19A Fortuna
1869.description: Auraxis Firearms launched the Fortuna Mercenary for the discerning soldier of fortune that prefers close-quarters combat without having to give up their shotgun.

5222.name: M60-A Bulldog
5222.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

4745.description: The M20 Kestrel couples a large magazine size with no damage falloff, allowing it to perform well against enemy aircraft at long range. NC use only.
4745.name: M20 Kestrel

803492.name: M40 Fury
803492.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

802322.name: NS Baron G5AE
802322.description: Nanite Systems' launched the tube-fed Baron G5 shotgun to help round out their extensive arsenal. Decked out with a special orange stripe paintjob, the Baron G5AE performs well at ranges typical shotguns become ineffective. All factions can use NS weapons.

3083.name: G30 Walker
3083.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

2.description: The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. NC use only.
2.name: NC4 Mag-Shot

6002956.name: Hardlight Barrier
6002956.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. This barrier can co-exist alongside a deployed Reserve Hardlight Barrier.

75289.name: Motion Spotter 5
75289.description: While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 50 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 240 seconds, five can be carried.

6005970.name: NSX-A Sesshin
6005970.description: The NSX Sesshin was intended as a multi-class platform that filled an aggressive, mid-long range combat role, though it was eventually set aside as company resources shifted in favor of developing the Daimyo and Tomoe.

803431.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower
803431.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

39001.name: TRS-12 Uppercut
39001.description: The TRS-12 Uppercut's highly mobile platform provides great versatility and speed while engaging multiple targets. TR use only.

803799.name: AE Medical Applicator 3
803799.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6009041.name: Bastion Battery
6009041.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

6004198.name: Mystery Weapon
6004198.description: This exceptional weapon will be unveiled at a later date.

7414.name: Spiker
7414.description: Reverse-engineered from ancient Vanu tech, the Spiker makes use of a standard 2x burst, as well as an alternate firing mode which charges up an armor piercing blast.

803596.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803596.description: The Hoplon Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.

6009016.name: Bastion CIWS
6009016.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

803490.name: G40-F Ranger
803490.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6122.name: P525 Marauder-H
6122.description: The P525 Marauder-H fires 40mm high explosive grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. TR use only.

802316.name: Hardlight Dagger
802316.description: The New Conglomerate's holographic Hardlight Dagger continually maintains the blade to keep itself sharp. Tapering down to only a few molecules at the edge of the blade, it can cut through body armor with ease.

6006299.name: LA1 Service Anchor
6006299.description: Liberty Arsenal forged this special variant of the LA1 Anchor in recognition of the weapon's long-term performance in the hands of a skillful operator.

7169.name: GD-7F
7169.description: Genudine Dynamics' initial venture into carbines produced the GD-7F. Its high rate of fire makes it an effective weapon in close quarter combat situations. NC use only.

16031.name: MR1 Fracture
16031.description: The MR1 Fracture is a dual rotary cannon that fires self-propelled, high velocity rockets designed specifically to penetrate vehicle armor. TR use only.

554.name: MANA Anti-Personnel Turret
554.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Personnel turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against soft and medium armored targets.

7512.name: M6 Onslaught
7512.description: The M6 Onslaught was designed as a defensive alternative to the MX1, allowing for a higher rate of fire suitable for holding down important locations. TR use only.

1989.name: DMR-99
1989.description: Though currently not in production, the Terran Republic's powerful DMR-99 has a dedicated following of designated marksmen that stick by their tried-and-true battle rifle, rather than switch to a newer model.

6006850.name: SR-200
6006850.description: The SR-200 embodies the long-distance stopping power of a traditional bolt-action, while retaining versatility through a balanced reload speed and attachment variety. NSO use only.

16032.name: Vortex VM21
16032.description: The Vortex VM21 fires a charged particle beam that punches through vehicle armor with incredible accuracy and speed. Holding down fire will accumulate charges, dealing more damage while consuming more ammo. VS use only.

3708.name: G40-F Ranger
3708.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft.  NC use only.

6005672.name: Skywall Shield Emitter
6005672.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage. NC only.

6002524.name: Orbital Strike Uplink
6002524.description: This uplink structure can unleash a devastating attack from orbit. When powered and charged, any target in range can be designated using a tool obtained from the uplink terminal. Longer distance strikes cost additional charge, so frequent or long distance attacks will require longer term defense of the structure.

7126.name: T1B Cycler
7126.description: The versatile T1B Cycler is nearly identical to the original, with an added accurate burst fire mode. TR use only.

803756.description: The NC05 Jackhammer's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat. It features a unique burst fire mode that doubles its rate of fire. NC use only.
803756.name: NC05 Jackhammer AE

6008909.name: Mauler Cannon
6008909.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

7505.name: AF-34 Mattock
7505.description: The AF-34 Mattock features increased effective range in comparison to the other MAX anti-infantry weapons. NC use only.

1.name: Mag-Cutter
1.description: The New Conglomerate's Mag-Cutter features a powerful electromagnet capable of cutting through enemy body armor.

2314.name: MKV Suppressed
2314.description: The MKV has an integrated suppressor that prevents the user from showing on the minimap when firing. It features superior bullet velocity and long range stopping power compared to SMGs using optional aftermarket suppressors.

803607.name: Rampart Wall
803607.description: Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.

6003599.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003599.description: The right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

19000.name: LC2 Lynx
19000.description: Very few weapons are able to touch the Lynx's incredible rate of fire. Featuring a cyclic rate of 909 RPM, the LC2 Lynx tears through infantry at close to medium range.

101.name: Medical Kit
101.description: This single-use Medical Kit instantly restores 500 health via needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

1914.name: TRAC-Shot
1914.description: Though not officially sanctioned for use on the field, the TR has turned a blind eye to the use of the TRAC-Shot. Bolted together by TR mechanics in their downtime, the TRAC-Shot's multiple rail attachments are unconventional but effective.

377.name: Ammunition Package 1
377.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

4911.name: M18 Rotary
4911.description: The M18 Rotary's high firing rate allows it to shred enemy fighters at short range. TR use only.

6004216.name: MG-HBR1 Dragoon
6004216.description: The Dragoon is a heavy battle rifle with automatic firing capabilities that hits hard at any range. TR use only.

7316.name: TRAP-M1
7316.description: The TRAP-M1 can switch between short-range 3-round burst and long-range 2-round burst firing modes, allowing for incredible flexibility on the battlefield.

6009037.name: Bastion Battery
6009037.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

6004714.name: Soldier Soaker
6004714.description:
Designed to combat the Indar heat, the Soldier Soaker was an inconvenient, yet familiar way to cool off soldiers in need.

Limited event item.

40002.name: LA39 Bruiser
40002.description: Liberty Arsenal's flagship pump shotgun, the LA39 Bruiser is designed to inflict massive damage on infantry targets. NC use only.

266.description: The powerful Phoenix AE uses a camera guided missile that allows the user to adjust its trajectory mid-flight. NC use only.
266.name: Phoenix AE

6002480.name: Pillbox
6002480.description: Small fortified structure that can provide cover for both infantry and deployed equipment.

6003551.name: Router
6003551.description: When placed, the Router becomes a spawn point for allies.

6002553.name: IPC Targeting Dart
6002553.description: The IPC Targeting Dart fires a dart projectile that can be targeted by Glaive IPC, the projectiles of each tool is linked to and can only be targeted by the cannon it is pulled from.

5224.name: C150 Dalton
5224.description: The C150 Dalton fires 150mm Armor Piercing Anti-Tank rounds that inflict massive damage in a single shot. All factions can use this weapon.

7513.name: M2 Mutilator
7513.description: The M2's increased ammo capacity has proven itself as a boon to small or stranded squads. TR use only.

6005301.name: L100 Python HESH
6005301.description: The Python HESH carries high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, and more lethal against enemy infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

6008906.name: Mauler Cannon
6008906.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

5250.name: L105 Zephyr PX
5250.description: The L105 Zephyr PX fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

24004.name: EM4 Longshot
24004.description: The bulky EM4 Longshot's overclocked propulsion coils allow for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.

6121.name: G20 Vulcan-H
6121.description: G20 Vulcan-H fires armor piercing 20mm rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets. TR use only.

804747.name: NS-10G Burster
804747.description: This gold, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

75170.name: NS-44G Commissioner
75170.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

6009039.name: Bastion Battery
6009039.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

804723.name: NS-20G Gorgon
804723.description: This gold left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

803034.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803034.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

6007252.name: Water Balloon
6007252.description:
Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Limited event item.

6002661.name: NS-44L "Ravenous" Blackhand
6002661.description: With an extended barrel and integrated scope the NS-44L Blackhand provides significant advantages over similar pistols when engaging threats at longer ranges.

24001.name: SAS-R
24001.description: The medium-range SAS-R's sniper rifle features a rapid bolt action that allows users to make follow up shots on targets before they can reach cover. NC use only.

71563.name: Anti-Vehicle MANA Turret
71563.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target.

6002348.name: Infantry Tower
6002348.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units.

6005225.name: Ammunition Package 1
6005225.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6005472.name: NSX Raijin
6005472.description: Three Raijin shurikens are tossed in a vertical spread, allowing their kinetic edge to strike deep into enemy armor at multiple locations.

1924.name: T9A "Butcher"
1924.description: The Butcher gained its reputation as a fearsome weapon capable of unending, long-range suppressive fire following a series of extended engagements at The Crown. Built on the CARV platform, the Butcher's notoriety has been earned over time in blood.

7191.name: TRAC-5 Burst
7191.description: The burst fire variant of the TRAC-5 provides accurate and controllable firepower suitable for any number of situations. TR use only.

1267.name: Ammunition Package 5
1267.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6003172.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
6003172.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

5508.name: M20 Drake
5508.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6563.name: VLG Missile Launcher
6563.description: The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

6109.name: G40-F Ranger
6109.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

24002.name: Impetus
24002.description: The semi-automatic Impetus sniper rifle is a favorite amongst Infiltrators for covert operations. It excels at medium range due to its considerable stopping power and rate of fire. NC use only.

704.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
704.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

7213.name: Solstice SF
7213.description: A built-in select fire mode gives users of the Solstice SF the ability to adapt to nearly any scenario. VS use only.

1849.name: NS Baron G5G
1849.description: Nanite Systems' first attempts into close-range weaponry resulted in the powerful Baron G5. The tube fed Baron is able to put down targets at longer ranges than typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.

6005659.name: Elysium Spawn Tube
6005659.description: When powered by an adjacent silo the Elysium Spawn Tube will provide a spawn point for nearby allies at the cost of a small amount of Cortium each spawn. Additionally, it includes a binding option, allowing those linked to it to spawn at it from anywhere on the continent. You can only bind to one point at a time.

4305.name: Light PPA
4305.description: The Light PPA is a slow-firing plasma cannon that inflicts massive damage at close range. VS use only.

6006606.name: AE Medical Applicator 1
6006606.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6005626.name: Light Air Terminal
6005626.description: The Light Air Terminal can be used to spawn light aircraft such as ESFs and Valkyries at the cost of Cortium.

803785.name: AE Medical Applicator 1
803785.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

24003.name: LA80
24003.description: The high muzzle velocity of the LA80's projectiles reduces the amount that a target must be lead, making it an excellent choice for sniping targets at extreme distances. NC use only.

5502.name: M20 Drake
5502.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6561.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6561.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

5050.description: The M18 Locust incorporates a large magazine and steady damage over distance, allowing it to engage enemy aircraft from beyond their reach. TR use only.
5050.name: M18 Locust

724.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
724.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

804405.name: NS-61B Emissary
804405.description: The fully automatic NS-61B Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. This variant of the NS-61 features a black finish. All factions can use this weapon.

803819.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 5
803819.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

6009020.name: Bastion CIWS
6009020.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6002452.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
6002452.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

6005495.name: CAS 14-E
6005495.description: The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

5505.name: M20 Drake
5505.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

800625.name: Auraxium Chainblade
800625.description: Legal possession of an Auraxium Chainblade is considered a badge of honor amongst the Terran Republic.  Only the most revered TR soldiers will ever wield this powerful and highly desired miniature chainsaw.

6008670.name: NSX "Networked" Daimyo
6008670.description: Daimyo's three-round magazine contains the headshot killing potential of a bolt-action sniper rifle, with the follow-up potential usually found in semi-automatic snipers. All factions can use NS weapons.

1884.name: The Brawler
1884.description: Exemplary of NC ingenuity and their utter disdain for rules, the aftermarket parts welded into the Brawler not only make it more accurate than typical shotguns, but also illegal to possess in the Terran Republic. Not that they care.

804273.name: Turret AI Module
804273.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. TR use only.

803592.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Tower
803592.description: Construct a Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

6002366.name: Alarm Module
6002366.description: Alerts the owner and their squad when an enemy is detected or a construct is attacked within 100 meters of the alarm module. Will automatically deconstruct if owner is offline for more than 2 minutes.

1630.name: Medical Applicator 6
1630.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

7496.name: NS-7G PDW
7496.description: This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a solid gold finish.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.

3155.name: L100 Python HESH
3155.description: The Python HESH carries high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, and more lethal against enemy infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

5207.description: The L-30R Vektor is accurate but slow firing and can pierce all types of armor. All factions can use this weapon.
5207.name: L-30R Vektor

15016.name: NS-10 Burster
15016.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. TR use only.

6009005.name: Mauler Cannon
6009005.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

804981.name: Blast Wall
804981.description: Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.

6003850.name: MGR-S1 Gladius
6003850.description: Originally reserved for members of Nomad, the Gladius is the hardest hitting SMG ever designed. NC use only.

6005487.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6005487.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

803699.name: NS-15 Gallows
803699.description: Your targets can't avoid their date with the Gallows forever...

803803.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 2
803803.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

2801.name: M12 Kobalt
2801.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005172.name: Recon Detection Device 4
6005172.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.5 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

6005329.name: Reserve Hardlight Barrier
6005329.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. Only one barricade may be active at a time.

803487.name: G30 Walker
803487.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7152.name: Corvus VA55
7152.description: The Corvus VA55 features low recoil and high accuracy over sustained fire, making it a popular choice for long range engagements. VS use only.

6005374.name: Medical Applicator 3
6005374.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

802301.name: NS Annihilator-G
802301.description: Nanite Systems' Annihilator was the first rocket launcher to integrate both air and ground-based lockon capabilities, at cost to its dumbfire capabilities. This variant of the weapon sports a classy gold plating. All factions can use NS weapons. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>

25007.name: HSR-1
25007.description: The accurate Heavy Scout Rifle features a higher rate of fire compared to semi-auto sniper rifles. TR use only.

1969.name: The Moonshot
1969.description: An experimental prototype based off the EM4 resulted in the Moonshot, a hyper-long range bolt-action sniper rifle. While stealth is not the Moonshot's specialty, the speed at which it can drop even the farthest targets offsets its drawbacks.

7257.name: T32 Bull
7257.description: Developed for a mix of close quarters combat and point defense, the T32 Bull features both balanced recoil and high maneuverability. TR use only.

6112.name: M60-G Bulldog-H
6112.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

803496.name: M60-G Bulldog
803496.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

75288.name: Motion Spotter 4
75288.description: While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 45 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 180 seconds, four can be carried.

6005698.name: Rampart Wall
6005698.description: Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.

1626.name: Medical Applicator 2
1626.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6004742.name: Water Balloon
6004742.description:
Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Limited event item.

6009036.name: Bastion Battery
6009036.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

802317.name: Damascus Edge
802317.description: Continually regenerating its cutting edge thanks to an embedded nanoconstructor, the Damascus Edge's patterned blade and cutting ability are thanks to a molecular structure similar to the legendary steel of the same name.

804879.name: RD-GG Recon Device 4
804879.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.5 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

1276.name: Ammunition Package 4
1276.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

2315.name: MKV-B Suppressed
2315.description: The MKV has an integrated suppressor that prevents the user from showing on the minimap when firing. It features superior bullet velocity and long range stopping power compared to SMGs using optional aftermarket suppressors.

802782.name: NS-44LG Blackhand
802782.description: With an extended barrel and integrated scope the NS-44L Blackhand provides significant advantages over similar pistols when engaging threats at longer ranges.

6009064.name: Hardlight Canopy
6009064.description: Deploy a generator that creates a hardlight canopy. The canopy appears a few meters above the generator and blocks incoming projectiles from above. Only 1 canopy can be active at a time.

6005456.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
6005456.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

6005221.name: Nano-Armor Kit 5
6005221.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

1629.name: Medical Applicator 5
1629.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

25002.name: KSR-35
25002.description: The KSR-35's high-powered 7x65 cartridge is extremely effective at dropping targets at medium range. TR use only.

803483.name: M12 Kobalt
803483.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

124.name: Nano-Armor Kit 1

The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6550.name: M20 Wyvern
6550.description: The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005239.name: M12 Kobalt
6005239.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005497.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6005497.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

4906.name: M14 Banshee
4906.description: The M14 Banshee is a high speed gatling gun that fires explosive 14mm rounds, excellent for dealing with enemy infantry and light vehicles. TR use only.

6006400.name: Halberd SE
6006400.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

6005169.name: Recon Detection Device 1
6005169.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.

1612.name: Medical Applicator 6
1612.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

803591.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Tower
803591.description: Construct a Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

7212.name: Solstice Burst
7212.description: Vanu Esamir's weapon labs created the Solstice Burst to further extend the weapon's range with a controlled burst fire mode. VS use only.

803818.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 4
803818.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

3461.name: Supernova VPC
3461.description: The Supernova VPC is charged with volatile high-explosive plasma that is less effective against armor, and more lethal to enemy personnel. VS use only.

6003793.name: NS-44L Showdown
6003793.description: This heavily modified version of the NS-44L Blackhand retains balance from the hip and precision at range, but relies on instinct, instead of optics.

802897.name: Aphelion VEX-4
802897.description: This experimental laser weapon can tear through enemies with sustained fire, but an interesting side effect causes a build up of residual energy while firing that can be harnessed into a devastating blast.

6003553.name: Router
6003553.description: When placed, the Router becomes a spawn point for allies.

75517.name: NC Patriot Flare Gun
75517.description: The NC Patriot Flare Gun fires a variety of blue flares. NC use only

804751.name: NS-10G Burster
804751.description: This gold, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005488.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6005488.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

29001.name: Sirius SX12
29001.description: An energy efficient power core interface allows the Sirius SX12 to take out multiple targets before needing to reload. VS use only.

5204.name: M20 Drake
5204.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005963.name: Proximity Mine
6005963.description: A deceptive looking land mine that, upon detecting nearby enemy infantry, explodes into a cloud of anti-infantry shrapnel.

6009008.name: Mauler Cannon
6009008.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

5229.name: L105 Zephyr
5229.description: The L105 Zephyr fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

5516.name: A30 Walker
5516.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6100.name: M12 Kobalt-H
6100.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

7103.name: Carnage AR
7103.description: Designed in the late 28th century for close quarters and mid-range combat scenarios, the Carnage AR features high hip fire accuracy and an adaptable attachment system. NC use only.

1944.name: Shuriken
1944.description: Designed for use by the Terran Republic's top Infiltrator hit squads, the Shuriken's incredible flexibility both close-up and at a distance allowed TR assassins to deal with a multitude of situations they may've not survived otherwise.

7102.name: Gauss Rifle S
7102.description: The Gauss Rifle S possesses a select fire option that allows for further adaptability on the battlefield. NC use only.

7215.name: Zenith VX-5
7215.description: Vanu Labs' close-to-midrange Zenith VX-5 uses advanced crystalline structures to significantly reduce weight without compromising on strength. It features both precision hipfire and increased movement speed while aiming.

21.description: The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. VS use only.
21.name: Beamer VS3

6551.name: M20 Wyvern
6551.description: The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

4447.name: Coyote Missiles
4447.description: The Coyote Missile platform's proximity-based homing missiles excel at destroying lightly armored aircraft, but are less proficient at harming heavily armored targets. VS use only.

6008651.name: Ancient Psykinetic Blade
6008651.description: These alien shards are held in place with a psykinetic link channeled through the gauntlet. This weapon was re-created from Briggs' original design, constructed after his mind-altering encounter with an ancient Vanu artifact.

6005706.name: Pain Spire
6005706.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that will damage enemy infantry and MAX within 15 meters of the spire. All Factions can use this item.

6005171.name: Recon Detection Device 3
6005171.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.75 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.

802099.name: NS-11AB
802099.description: The 11AB was designed as a customizable weapon system that could adapt to nearly every situation. This variant of the 11A features a sleek black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

802516.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802516.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

6110.name: G40-F Ranger
6110.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6008666.name: NS-61 "Networked" Emissary
6008666.description: The fully automatic NS-61 Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. All factions can use this weapon.

1082.name: MAX Punch
1082.description: Powered exosuits swinging heavy MAX weaponry have proven to have devastating effects on soldiers unfortunate enough to get in the way.

802101.name: NS-11AG
802101.description: The 11AG is the gold high-end variant of the adaptable 11A assault rifle platform. Reliable with a wide assortment of attachments, the 11AG can change itself to excel in nearly any situation. All factions can use NS weapons.

5202.name: M20 Drake
5202.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005967.name: NSX-A Kuwa
6005967.description: Unlike its Yumi predecessor, the NSX Kuwa will, after a short windup, release a torrent of accurate, high caliber rounds down range until the trigger is released. This weapon is a hybrid rifle, available to Engineer, Combat Medic, and Heavy Assault classes.

804703.name: Cortium Silo
804703.description: Silos hold up to 50,000 Cortium and are required to power modules and other core structures. ANTs are required to deposit additional Cortium into a Silo.

6006283.name: WLT-Weaver Mining Turret
6006283.description: This nose-mounted mining turret can fire heavy machine gun rounds with its primary fire, and harvest cortium from long range with its mining laser alternate fire.

6008733.name: NEST Launcher
6008733.description: Equips an intelligent micro-missile launcher that uses proximity-based tracking to home in on nearby enemy vehicles.

6002361.name: Lumifiber Rampart Wall
6002361.description: Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.

486.name: Recon Detection Device 6
486.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.

6005435.name: WLT-Howler Mining Laser
6005435.description: The Howler mining laser can quickly extract Cortium from smaller nodes and wreck player made buildings, but will overheat during prolonged use. All factions can use this weapon.

17012.name: Quasar VM1
17012.description: The heavy Quasar VM1 was one of the earliest weapons created with discovered Vanu technology. The rapid firing plasma cannon can tear apart enemy foot soldiers with ease. VS use only.

804795.name: NSX Amaterasu
804795.description: While wielded, the Amaterasu can strike enemies at a distance using crescent wave technology, the trade-off is that it is less capable than traditional knives for piercing infantry protective gear.

6005457.name: M20 Drake
6005457.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

1084.name: MAX Punch
1084.description: Powered exosuits swinging heavy MAX weaponry have proven to have devastating effects on soldiers unfortunate enough to get in the way.

804727.name: NS-20G Gorgon
804727.description: This gold left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005302.name: C75 Viper
6005302.description: The C75 is able to rapid fire six 75mm HEAT shells.  The damage potential is great when all shells hit their target, but the cannon is unstable when firing at the maximum rate. All factions can use this weapon.

6002772.name: Eridani SX5-AE

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

7610.description: This single-use Restoration Kit regenerates 70 health per second for 12 seconds through needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

50561.description: Nanite Systems' Annihilator was the first rocket launcher to integrate both air and ground-based lockon capabilities, at cost to its dumbfire capabilities. All factions can use NS weapons. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>

803813.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

4601.name: Breaker Rocket Pods
4601.description: Breaker Rocket Pods fire a volley of up to 12 unguided, high-explosive rockets. NC use only.

6002478.name: Pillbox
6002478.description: Small fortified structure that can provide cover for both infantry and deployed equipment.

803429.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Tower
803429.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

25001.name: TSAR-42
25001.description: Deadly in the hands of a skilled Infiltrator, the bolt action TSAR-42's features a unique bolt rotation system designed to improve the time between shots. TR use only.

26001.name: Ghost
26001.description: The Ghost VS12's high rate of fire provides considerable lethality at medium range due to its modified heat-shunting discharge coil. VS use only.

6008660.name: NSX "Ivory" Tengu
6008660.description: The playful Tengu SMG scatters four pellets per shot, and narrows its pellet spread while aiming down sights. All factions can use NS weapons.

803786.name: AE Medical Applicator 1
803786.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6005331.name: MG-H1 Watchman AE
6005331.description: Equipped with a state of the art cooling jacket, the Watchman LMG boasts the highest rate of fire of any weapon in its class. TR use only.

33002.name: NC15 Phoenix
33002.description: The powerful NC15 Phoenix uses a camera guided missile that allows the user to adjust its trajectory mid-flight. NC use only.

1269.name: Ammunition Package 2
1269.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

28000.name: SMG-46 Armistice
28000.description: The SMG-46 Armistice fully automatic submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.

7211.name: Pulsar C
7211.description: Based off of its bigger assault rifle brother, the smaller Pulsar C  was developed with an emphasis on stopping power. While not as easy to control, the heavy-hitting Pulsar C is far more devastating at close range. VS use only.

6005428.name: M20 Basilisk
6005428.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6002930.name: NS-AM7 AE/TR Archer
6002930.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition Archer anti-material rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to dispatch MAX-based threats at medium to long range.

6005436.name: WLT-Mandible Mining Laser
6005436.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

4002.name: M20 Basilisk
4002.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. TR use only.

6002467.name: Elysium Spawn Tube
6002467.description: When powered by an adjacent silo the Elysium Spawn Tube will provide a spawn point for nearby allies at the cost of a small amount of Cortium each spawn. Additionally, it includes a binding option, allowing those linked to it to spawn at it from anywhere on the continent. You can only bind to one point at a time.

803826.name: NS-44 Commissioner AE
803826.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

2500.name: M12 Kobalt-F
2500.description: The M12 Kobalt is a 50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6002955.name: Hardlight Barrier
6002955.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. This barrier can co-exist alongside a deployed Reserve Hardlight Barrier.
