6002360.name: Lumifiber Rampart Wall
6002360.description: Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.

7337.description: Equipped with an experimental regenerating power core, the Phaseshift VX-S has no use for traditional ammunition, and can switch between semi-auto and bolt-action firing modes to fit the engagement range. VS use only.
7337.name: Phaseshift VX-S

5442.name: Dual-75 Duster
5442.description: The Duster is equipped with dual 75mm cannons that are able to quickly unload its ten round magazine. Each shot decreases accuracy unless given time to recover; this allows the D-75 to feather accurate shots or bombard a wider area by unloading.

730.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret
730.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

6002474.name: Light Vehicle Terminal
6002474.description: The Light Vehicle Terminal can be used to spawn small and medium sized ground vehicles at the cost of Cortium.

7104.name: NC9 A-Tross
7104.description: The NC's A-Tross was created as the ultimate in heavy-hitting, long-range assault rifles. Featuring a 30-round magazine and an overclocked propulsion coil firing a high-damage projectile, the A-Tross can drop targets at even distant ranges.

803787.name: AE Medical Applicator 1
803787.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

71565.name: Anti-Vehicle MANA Turret
71565.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target.

485.name: Recon Detection Device 6
485.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.

1954.name: The President
1954.description: This Auraxium-clad variant of the TX1 Repeater is a replica of former Terran Republic President Connery's weapon of choice. Equipped with a special suppressor, this silenced pistol remains effective even at longer ranges.

6005498.name: VLG Missile Launcher
6005498.description: The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

6008928.name: Bastion CIWS
6008928.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

804882.name: RD-GG Recon Device 5
804882.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.25 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

6005381.name: G40-F Ranger
6005381.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6006684.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 3
6006684.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

6005650.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Turret
6005650.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

6009029.name: M20-W Appaloosa
6009029.description: The M20-W is a high-capacity variant of the standard M20 Mustang nosegun, meant for use specifically with interceptor setups of the Reaver VTOL fighter. NC use only.

5515.name: M60-A Bulldog
5515.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6005379.name: M20 Basilisk-H
6005379.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

7609.name: Restoration Kit
7609.description: This single-use Restoration Kit regenerates 70 health per second for 12 seconds through needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

5216.name: CAS30 Tank Buster
5216.description: The CAS30 Tank Buster armor piercing rounds are highly effective against tanks. All factions can use this weapon.

16026.name: AF-23 Grinder
16026.description: Auraxis Firearms' first venture into MAX weaponry was the AF-23 Grinder. It features an extended ammo reserve for sustained fire. NC use only.

804877.name: RD-GG Recon Device 3
804877.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.75 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.

6002525.name: Orbital Strike Uplink
6002525.description: This uplink structure can unleash a devastating attack from orbit. When powered and charged, any target in range can be designated using a tool obtained from the uplink terminal. Longer distance strikes cost additional charge, so frequent or long distance attacks will require longer term defense of the structure.

1095.name: Anti-Vehicle Grenade
1095.description:
Anti-Vehicle Grenades can stick to and damage vehicles and MAX units, but are less harmful to standard infantry.

3 second fuse.

6005668.name: Turret AI Module
6005668.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. NC use only.

1889.name: The Executive
1889.description: The Auraxium variant of the NC4, The Executive is typically only issued to the enigmatic members of The Board, the New Conglomerate's governing body. It features a unique low-velocity suppressor that doesn't affect stopping power at range.

71564.name: Anti-Vehicle MANA Turret
71564.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target.

3154.name: L100 Python HESH
3154.description: The Python HESH carries high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, and more lethal against enemy infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

6009043.name: Bastion Battery
6009043.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

6002367.name: Alarm Module
6002367.description: Alerts the owner and their squad when an enemy is detected or a construct is attacked within 100 meters of the alarm module. Will automatically deconstruct if owner is offline for more than 2 minutes.

6002824.name: AF-4AE Cyclone
6002824.description: The 4th Anniversary Edition AF-4 Cyclone submachine gun offers higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.

5210.name: AP30 Shredder
5210.description: The AP30 Shredder machine gun is capable of inflicting sustained and accurate damage with its 30mm armor piercing rounds.  All factions can use this weapon.

804749.name: NS-10G Burster
804749.description: This gold, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

286.description: Although slower than the VS standard issue Force-Blade, when wielded this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. VS use only.
286.name: Lumine Edge

7190.name: T5 AMC
7190.description: The T5 AMC's damage output and controllable recoil was designed around giving Terran Republic soldiers increased effectiveness in medium range encounters. TR use only.

6002918.name: NS-AM7 VS/AE Archer
6002918.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition Archer anti-material rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to dispatch MAX-based threats at medium to long range.

6004530.name: Reserve Hardlight Barrier
6004530.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. Only one barricade may be active at a time.

70998.name: NS-11A
70998.description: The 11A was designed as a highly adaptable weapons system that could be customized to nearly any situation. Its large, rapid-reload magazine and high-velocity cartridges complement its variety of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.

6004197.name: NSX-P Naginata
6004197.description: The Naginata light machine gun can maintain rounds on medium ranged targets without releasing the trigger, but quickly loses that benefit while moving. All factions can use NS weapons.

804876.name: RD-GG Recon Device 3
804876.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.75 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.

802025.name: Auraxium Slasher
802025.description: For the dedicated knife-wielding psycho, access to the hypnotically-shifting Auraxium Slasher is mysteriously granted after demonstrating a disturbing devotion to their craft.

4300.name: Photon A2A Missile Pods
4300.description: After a short lock-on period, Photon A2A missiles can be fired which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. VS use only.

6008371.name: PSA-02 Diamondback
6008371.description: The Diamondback assault rifle is a more aggressive take on the time-tested, and highly adaptable NS-11A.

6005226.name: Ammunition Package 2
6005226.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6002349.name: Infantry Tower
6002349.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units.

503.name: MANA Anti-Vehicle Turret
503.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.

803588.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803588.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

6005655.name: Router
6005655.description: When placed, the Router becomes a spawn point for allies.

803036.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803036.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

6006065.name: M202 Wyrm
6006065.description: The M202 Wyrm wing-mounted machine guns fire slow, high-damage rounds most effective against heavily armored land and air vehicles.

6105.name: M20 Basilisk-H
6105.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6006399.name: Halberd SE
6006399.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

6006146.name: NS Campion
6006146.description: The Campion has earned a sinister reputation on the battlefield after seeing extensive use by Stalker Infiltrators during its initial rollout.

650.name: Tank Mine
650.description: User deployable anti-vehicular mine, activated by nearby enemy vehicles.

69999.name: NS-11P
69999.description: The NS-11P is a platinum variant of the NS-11A.  Its large, rapid-reload magazine and high-velocity cartridges complement its variety of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005430.name: G40-F Ranger
6005430.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7276.name: SVA-88
7276.description: The SVA-88's overclocked discharge coil allows it to fire plasma at a higher velocity than most weapons in its class. When firing at long distances, the user will need to lead targets much less than usual. VS use only.

6004286.name: Routing Spire
6004286.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that, when powered, houses a spawnpoint Router. All Factions can use this item.

6004750.name: Flamewake Grenade
6004750.description: On impact, this experimental grenade douses infantry within 3 meters in a flammable liquid, and sets them aflame for 6 seconds.

802319.name: NS-15M AE
802319.description: The NS-15M AE is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that leaves little downtime during reloads. This commemorative edition of the popular all-arounder LMG features an exclusive orange stripe paintjob. All factions can use NS weapons.

6003602.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003602.description: The right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

6008645.name: NSX "Ivory" Yumi
6008645.description: The Yumi burst rifle is capable of, after a short delay, unleashing a rapid five round volley. With proper shot placement, Yumi can strike down mid-range targets more quickly than most weapons in its class. All factions can use NS weapons.

2310.name: Blackheart
2310.description: The powerful Blackheart Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

84.description: The unguided Shrike rocket launcher is equipped with high-explosive warheads and has both anti-personnel and anti-armor capabilities. NC use only.
84.name: Shrike

7193.name: LC3 Jaguar
7193.description: Boasting a longer barrel than its compact Light Carbine cousin, the mobile LC3 Jaguar was designed to provide accurate hip fire at longer distances than the Lynx. TR use only.

6009022.name: Bastion CIWS
6009022.description: Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.

6005646.name: Lumifiber Rampart Wall
6005646.description: Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.

6008668.name: NSX "Networked" Naginata
6008668.description: The Naginata light machine gun can maintain rounds on medium ranged targets without releasing the trigger, but quickly loses that benefit while moving. All factions can use NS weapons.

75172.name: NS-44B Commissioner
75172.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

6008671.name: NSX "Networked" Tengu
6008671.description: The playful Tengu SMG scatters four pellets per shot, and narrows its pellet spread while aiming down sights. All factions can use NS weapons.

5494.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
5494.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

803600.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower
803600.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

76358.name: NS Deep Freeze
76358.description: The NS Deep Freeze is an experimental pistol that is capable of condensing and freezing atmospheric moisture then firing it as a projectile.

6004174.name: NC05-P Jackhammer
6004174.description: The NC05 Jackhammer's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat. It features a unique burst fire mode that doubles its rate of fire. NC use only.

7274.name: VX29 Polaris
7274.description: Embedded recoil dampeners along the barrel of the Polaris allow it to remain accurate when firing from the hip. VS use only.

804724.name: NS-20G Gorgon
804724.description: This gold right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005460.name: M60-A Bulldog
6005460.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6005384.name: M60-G Bulldog-H
6005384.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

2805.name: M20 Basilisk
2805.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

804880.name: RD-GG Recon Device 4
804880.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.5 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

1045.name: Proximity Mine
1045.description: A Vanu Sovereignty anti-personnel Proximity Mine that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.

2507.name: M20 Basilisk-F
2507.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

7256.name: TMG-50
7256.description: Designed with distance and accuracy in mind, the TMG-50's manageable recoil allows it to outperform other LMGs at long range. TR use only.

3101.name: C75 Viper
3101.description: The C75 is able to rapid fire six 75mm HEAT shells.  The damage potential is great when all shells hit their target, but the cannon is unstable when firing at the maximum rate. All factions can use this weapon.

800626.name: Auraxium Force-Blade
800626.description: The mark of a highly regarded soldier, the Vanu Sovereignty only offers the Auraxium Force Blade to their most capable warriors. Much like its standard-issue version, contact with the blade is incredibly damaging to human tissues.

3089.name: G40-F Ranger
3089.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

3085.name: G30 Walker
3085.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

5523.name: M60-A Bulldog
5523.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

804264.name: Skywall Shield Emitter
804264.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage. TR only.

3080.name: G30 Walker
3080.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

803605.name: Rampart Wall
803605.description: Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.

804268.name: Structure Shield Module
804268.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. VS only.

551.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
551.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

6005624.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Tower
6005624.description: Construct a Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

26004.name: Parallax VX3
26004.description: The powerful Parallax VX3 sniper rifle's heavy-hitting, high velocity plasma projectiles allow for easy long distance shots. VS use only.

6120.name: E540 Halberd-H
6120.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85mm armor-piercing rockets. All factions can use this weapon.

6006172.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6006172.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

29000.name: Eridani SX5
29000.description: The Eridani SX5 fully automatic submachine gun excels in close quarter combat situations. VS use only.

803825.name: NS-44 Commissioner AE
803825.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

6005632.name: The Flail
6005632.description: The Flail fires a volley of 4 mortar shells in quick succession, doing moderate damage to all in range. Requires AI module as well as a manually fired targeting dart in order to fire.

802105.name: NS-15MB
802105.description: Created with a black metal finish, the imposing NS-15MB has accurate, stable fire at even long distances and reloads quickly. Its reputation as an all-arounder has made it a popular Heavy Assault choice. All factions can use NS weapons.

75173.name: NS-357B Underboss
75173.description: Chambered for the powerful .357 magnum cartridge, the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than its bigger NS-44 brother. All factions can use this weapon.

3107.name: Skyguard
3107.description: The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

3441.name: E540 Halberd
3441.description: The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. VS use only.

7128.name: TAR
7128.description: Many TR soldiers praise the Terran Assault Rifle's performance in the field, crediting many victories to its incredible hip fire accuracy and high rate of fire. TR use only.

804653.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804653.description: The right handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

2837.name: M60-G Bulldog
2837.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6004288.name: The Flail
6004288.description: The Flail fires a volley of 4 mortar shells in quick succession, doing moderate damage to all in range. Requires AI module as well as a manually fired targeting dart in order to fire.

803811.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 3
803811.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

200.name: Anti-Infantry MANA Turret
200.description: Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-infantry machine gun turret. It is equipped with a projectile shield that protects the operator from forward facing threats.

6002954.name: Hardlight Barrier
6002954.description: Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. This barrier can co-exist alongside a deployed Reserve Hardlight Barrier.

6005330.name: MGR-L1 Promise AE
6005330.description: The Promise LMG's large magazine and high rate of fire are complemented by in-built counterweights for sustained accuracy. NC use only.

802512.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802512.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

6005669.name: Structure Shield Module
6005669.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. NC only.

7388.name: LA8 Rebel
7388.description: The LA8 Rebel's high damage gives it a longer effective range when compared to most side arms. NC use only.

6004873.name: Solid Wall
6004873.description: Large wall with no windows that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.

6004407.name: NS "Jackpot" Decimator
6004407.description: This lucky launcher has the full functionality of Nanite Systems' Decimator revisited with green and gold stylings. All factions can use this weapon.

804974.name: Reinforcements Module
804974.description: Allows deployed Sunderers within range of it to be a potential continent wide reinforcements needed spawnpoint; your faction population in the area must still meet the reinforcement needed requirements.

6005238.name: M40 Fury
6005238.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

726.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
726.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

4301.name: Dual Photon Pods
4301.description: Dual Photon Pods fire a volley of up to 14 unguided, high-explosive photon rockets. VS use only.

803597.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803597.description: The Hoplon Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.

2833.name: M60-G Bulldog
2833.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

5227.name: L105 Zephyr
5227.description: The L105 Zephyr fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

87.description: An upgraded version of the successful NC11, the magazine-fed NC14 Bolt Driver is common on the battlefield due to its versatility and high stopping power. NC use only.
87.name: NC14 Bolt Driver

802518.name: Spitfire Auto-Turret
802518.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

6005636.name: Glaive IPC
6005636.description: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.

804652.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804652.description: The left handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

804881.name: RD-GG Recon Device 4
804881.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.5 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

44.description: The versatile Solstice VE3 is an effective carbine suitable for most situations. VS use only.
44.name: Solstice VE3

6005545.name: Pummeler Rocket Pods
6005545.description: Pummeler Rocket Pods are equipped with small, anti-vehicle rockets that are fired from fixed-wing mounts, resulting an accurate volley with minimal deviation.

6009042.name: Bastion Battery
6009042.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

3081.name: G30 Walker
3081.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

7232.name: EM1
7232.description: Esamir Munition Corporation's EM1 LMG is a unique mix of high ammo count and fast reloading time, allowing the shooter to control firing lanes with little downtime. NC use only.

6005654.name: Reinforcements Module
6005654.description: Allows deployed Sunderers within range of it to be a potential continent wide reinforcements needed spawnpoint; your faction population in the area must still meet the reinforcement needed requirements.

804744.name: NS-10B Burster
804744.description: This black, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

4029.name: G30 Vulcan
4029.description: The G30 Vulcan fires armor piercing 30mm rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets. TR use only.

5213.name: A30 Walker
5213.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6005069.name: LB00 Python AP
6005069.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

476.name: Recon Detection Device 5
476.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

5519.name: M60-A Bulldog
5519.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6002453.name: Quick-Det Flash Grenade
6002453.description:
This short-fuse version of the standard Flash Grenade will temporarily blind and deafen infantry targets, but do so with less effectiveness as the original.

1.5 second fuse.

484.name: Recon Detection Device 5
484.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

1277.name: Ammunition Package 5
1277.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

6005480.name: A30 Walker
6005480.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

99.name: Medical Kit
99.description: This single-use Medical Kit instantly restores 500 health via needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.

6008911.name: Bastion Battery
6008911.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

43.description: Originally designed for spec-ops missions that can contain any number of situations, the TRAC-5's adaptability make it a solid choice for any soldier. TR use only.
43.name: TRAC-5

6005217.name: Nano-Armor Kit 1
6005217.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6005429.name: G30 Walker
6005429.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

24008.name: Warden
24008.description: The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine. NC use only.

6003410.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6003410.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

6005300.name: L100 Python HEAT
6005300.description: The Python HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

6005220.name: Nano-Armor Kit 4
6005220.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

803025.name: AV SpitFire Turret
803025.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

6005538.name: M20 Basilisk
6005538.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

267.description: The dumbfire-capable Striker AE houses a six-round magazine of compact, heat-seeking rockets that will home in when within proximity of enemy aircraft. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Proximity Seeking: Aircraft</font>
267.name: Striker AE

1608.name: Medical Applicator 2
1608.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

5209.name: AP30 Shredder
5209.description: The AP30 Shredder machine gun is capable of inflicting sustained and accurate damage with its 30mm armor piercing rounds.  All factions can use this weapon.

1097.name: NS Baron G5B
1097.description: Nanite Systems' first attempts into close-range weaponry resulted in the powerful Baron G5. The tube fed Baron is able to put down targets at longer ranges than typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.

1263.name: Nano-Armor Kit 5
1263.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

7401.name: TS2 Inquisitor
7401.description: The TS2 Inquisitor features an extended magazine capable of outlasting the enemy even in the most drawn out firefights. TR use only.

6114.name: M60-G Bulldog-H
6114.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

4600.name: M20 Mustang
4600.description: The M20 Mustang is the standard air superiority nose cannon for the NC Reaver.  Its high caliber rounds allow it to do more damage up close and at range.  NC use only.

27001.name: Blitz GD-10
27001.description: Equipped with a built-in extended magazine, the Blitz GD-10's increased ammo capacity enables it to put down multiple targets between reloads. NC use only.

803788.name: AE Medical Applicator 2
803788.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

804249.name: NSX Naginata
804249.description: The Naginata light machine gun can maintain rounds on medium ranged targets without releasing the trigger, but quickly loses that benefit while moving. All factions can use NS weapons.

2807.name: M12 Kobalt
2807.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

3104.name: L100 Python AP
3104.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

75286.name: Motion Spotter 2
75286.description: While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 35 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 120 seconds, three can be carried.

5503.name: M20 Drake
5503.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

35004.name: Nemesis VSH9
35004.description: The Nemesis VSH9's integrated IFF capabilities allow it to lock onto enemy aircraft, and retains dumbfire capabilities for ground-based combat. VS use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Optional Lockon: Aircraft</font>

1255.name: Nano-Armor Kit 5
1255.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6002554.name: Orbital Strike Target Designator
6002554.description: Designates a target for the connected OS uplink. For valid acquisition, the target must be no less than 200 meters from the uplink, fall within its current strike range (displayed on the map), and be within visual range of the designator.

1272.name: Ammunition Package 5
1272.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

7391.name: TX1-FB Repeater
7391.description: The reliable TX1 Repeater's 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. This variant features a unique gold plating.  TR use only.

6002466.name: Elysium Spawn Tube
6002466.description: When powered by an adjacent silo the Elysium Spawn Tube will provide a spawn point for nearby allies at the cost of a small amount of Cortium each spawn. Additionally, it includes a binding option, allowing those linked to it to spawn at it from anywhere on the continent. You can only bind to one point at a time.

20000.name: VX6-7
20000.description: The VX6-7's fast rate of fire and lightweight construction make it an excellent weapon in close quarters combat. VS use only.

128.description: The semi-automatic Mauler S6's overclocked propulsion coils and tighter spread make it a versatile close-range weapon. NC use only.
128.name: Mauler S6

6006701.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 6
6006701.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

285.description: Although slower than the TR standard issue Chainblade, when wielded this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. TR use only.
285.name: Ripper

6558.name: Hellion G20
6558.description: The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.

80.description: The Orion VS54 is the standard issue LMG for Vanu Heavy Assault soldiers. Its lightweight construction allows for more accurate hip fire and stability when on the move when compared to most weapons in its class. VS use only.
80.name: Orion VS54

7153.name: Terminus VX-9
7153.description: The Vanu's shadowy VX Labs launched the Terminus VX-9 shortly after joining the war. Engineered with advanced cooling systems that allow for its high rate of fire, the Terminus allows users to hold their ground at close-to-medium ranges.

6005666.name: Repair Module
6005666.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. NC use only.

1259.name: Nano-Armor Kit 5
1259.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6005068.name: LB00 Python AP
6005068.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

7124.name: Cycler TRV
7124.description: The Cycler TRV's fast rate of fire makes it extremely effective in close quarters, though that same rate of fire and high recoil limits its effectiveness at long range when firing in full-auto. TR use only.

6002350.name: Infantry Tower
6002350.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units.

93.name: Medical Applicator 1
93.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

7540.name: Lasher X2
7540.description: The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.

6104.name: M20 Basilisk-H
6104.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

7390.name: NC08 Mag-Scatter
7390.description: The NC08 Mag-Scatter's powerful gauss-propelled shot shells and compact frame make it an excellent close-range sidearm.

804255.name: NSX Daimyo
804255.description: Daimyo's three-round magazine contains the headshot killing potential of a bolt-action sniper rifle, with the follow-up potential usually found in semi-automatic snipers. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005423.name: MANA Anti-Personnel Turret
6005423.description: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Personnel turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against soft and medium armored targets.

6002800.name: SMG-46AE Armistice
6002800.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition of the SMG-46 Armistice submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.

89.description: The VA39 Spectre semi-automatic sniper rifle is the standard squad support weapon of Vanu Sovereignty Infiltrators. VS use only.
89.name: VA39 Spectre

803032.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803032.description: The Spitfire Auto-Turret is a deployable that automatically fires at hostile infantry within 50 meters.

4747.name: Coyote Missiles
4747.description: The Coyote Missile platform's proximity-based homing missiles excel at destroying lightly armored aircraft, but are less proficient at harming heavily armored targets. NC use only.

34003.name: M9 SKEP Launcher
34003.description: Equipped with an anti-armor SKEP warhead, the M9 was designed to lock-onto and destroy ground based vehicles, while retaining dumbfire capabilities for increased versatility. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>

15013.name: M3 Pounder HEG
15013.description: The M3 Pounder fires High Explosive Grenade rounds that have a devastating effect on enemy armor. TR use only.

1619.name: Medical Applicator 4
1619.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6006401.name: Halberd-H SE
6006401.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

1274.name: Ammunition Package 2
1274.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

3153.name: L100 Python HESH
3153.description: The Python HESH carries high-explosive squash head rounds that are less effective against armor, and more lethal against enemy infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

802903.name: NS Campion
802903.description: The Campion has earned a sinister reputation on the battlefield after seeing extensive use by Stalker Infiltrators during its initial rollout.

6003925.name: VE-S Canis
6003925.description: Advances in plasma manipulation technology have resulted in the VE-S Canis, a compact, close range weapon with a firing rate that increases over time. VS use only.

6004423.name: Pain Spire
6004423.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that will damage enemy infantry and MAX within 15 meters of the spire. All Factions can use this item.

804748.name: NS-10G Burster
804748.description: This gold, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

1611.name: Medical Applicator 5
1611.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6002491.name: Vehicle Gate
6002491.description: Vehicle Gates are large walls with an opening wide enough for vehicles to pass through; when combined with a Structure Shield Module the opening will be sealed with an energy shield that will block enemy vehicles and large projectiles.

6553.name: CAS 14-E
6553.description: The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

6009090.name: Caltrop
6009090.description: Deploys a Caltrop tank trap that inhibits the movement of vehicles. Lasts 30 minutes or until destroyed. Up to four Caltrops can be active at a time.

803495.name: M60-G Bulldog
803495.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6005243.name: F.U.S.E. (Anti-Infantry)
6005243.description: A deceptive looking land mine that, upon detecting nearby enemy infantry, explodes into a cloud of anti-infantry shrapnel.

6117.name: M40 Fury-H
6117.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

6005479.name: A30 Walker
6005479.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

804869.name: RD-GG Recon Device 6
804869.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.

6003600.name: NS-20 "Heatwave" Gorgon
6003600.description: The left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

7403.name: Beamer VS3-FB
7403.description: The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. This variant features a unique gold plating.  VS use only.

804252.name: NSX Tomoe
804252.description: Focusing on high rate of fire and deadly precision, Tomoe rewards headhunters, making it a desirable option for mid-range assassinations. All factions can use NS weapons.

804655.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804655.description: The right handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

803424.name: WLT-Mandible Mining Laser
803424.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

5510.name: M20 Drake
5510.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6002486.name: Vehicle Ammo Dispenser
6002486.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity.

6009002.name: Mauler Cannon
6009002.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

6562.name: VLG Missile Launcher
6562.description: The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

75285.name: Motion Spotter 1
75285.description: While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 30 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 120 seconds, two can be carried.

2876.name: M40 Fury
2876.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

6008652.name: NSX "Ivory" Daimyo
6008652.description: Daimyo's three-round magazine contains the headshot killing potential of a bolt-action sniper rifle, with the follow-up potential usually found in semi-automatic snipers. All factions can use NS weapons.

50562.name: Hunter QCX-P
50562.description: The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

803792.name: AE Medical Applicator 6
803792.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive. The AE variant uses the skill line of the default item.

6005242.name: M60-G Bulldog
6005242.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

3460.name: Supernova FPC
3460.description: The Supernova FPC is charged with fast-moving armor-piercing plasma that is more effective against armored targets and inflicts less explosive damage. VS use only.

6005628.name: Alarm Module
6005628.description: Alerts the owner and their squad when an enemy is detected or a construct is attacked within 100 meters of the alarm module. Will automatically deconstruct if owner is offline for more than 2 minutes.

7277.name: Flare VE6
7277.description: Vanu Esamir's AdvWep labs designed the heavy-hitting Flare VE6 to pack the most punch per shot. In the hands of an experience marksman, the Flare can wreak havoc on enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.

4604.name: Vortek Rotary
4604.description: The Vortek Rotary is a high damage, close range cannon that shreds enemy fighters with ease. NC use only.

803008.name: TR Triumph Flare Gun
803008.description: The TR Triumph Flare Gun fires a variety of entertaining flare patterns. TR use only.

153.name: Ammunition Package 1
153.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

7755.name: Flash Grenade
7755.description:
Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.

802315.name: Hexedge
802315.description: Reverse engineered thanks to the Terran Republic's robust intelligence agency, the razor-sharp Hexedge knife is no less deadly than the stolen Vanu prototypes it's based off of.

3730.name: Titan-150 AP
3730.description: The Titan-150 AP is loaded with fast moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets but inflict almost no explosive damage. NC use only.

6005303.name: Skyguard
6005303.description: The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6002758.name: EM4-AE Longshot
6002758.description: This 4th Anniversary Edition of the EM4 Longshot houses an overclocked propulsion coil for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.

4.description: The standard issue NC1 Gauss Rifle was the first successful implementation of coilgun technology in small arms. NC use only.
4.name: NC1 Gauss Rifle

1984.name: GD Guardian
1984.description: Genudine's heavily modified Guardian rifle was initially designed for long-range support for Heavy Assault soldiers ambushing from on high or in cover. Deadly from even long distances, the accurate Guardian can drop targets from afar with ammo to spare.

6002485.name: Vehicle Ammo Dispenser
6002485.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity.

5217.name: CAS30 Tank Buster
5217.description: The CAS30 Tank Buster armor piercing rounds are highly effective against tanks. All factions can use this weapon.

44705.name: Plasma Grenade
44705.description:
The standard Vanu Sovereignty plasma grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.

803817.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 3
803817.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

6002637.name: NS-R3 "Ravenous" Swarm
6002637.description: This custom-painted variant of the magazine-fed NS-R3 Swarm can switch between low velocity and high velocity rockets which lock onto both ground and air targets, allowing the user to tailor the weapon's tracking capabilities based on the engagement. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>

802299.name: NS Decimator-G
802299.description: Designed for raw power, this gold plated variant of the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. All factions can use NS weapons.

802300.name: NS Decimator-B
802300.description: Designed for raw power, this black variant of the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. All factions can use NS weapons.

803824.name: NS-44 Commissioner AE
803824.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

803589.name: Hoplon Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower
803589.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.

6005962.name: Tank Mine
6005962.description: User deployable anti-vehicular mine, activated by nearby enemy vehicles.

6005961.name: Tank Mine
6005961.description: User deployable anti-vehicular mine, activated by nearby enemy vehicles.

15004.name: NS-10 Burster
15004.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. TR use only.

16029.name: NCM3 Raven
16029.description: The right handed NCM3 Raven is a laser guided rocket launcher that deals heavy damage to vehicles. NC use only.

20.description: The Pulsar VS1 is the standard issue assault rifle for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its low recoil design allows it to remain effective in most situations. VS use only.
20.name: Pulsar VS1

3106.name: Skyguard
3106.description: The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

4446.name: Hornet Missiles
4446.description: The Hornet Missiles are laser guided and will fly towards the pilot's crosshairs.  VS use only.

6108.name: G30 Walker
6108.description: The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

1256.name: Nano-Armor Kit 2
1256.description:
The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

6125.name: Proton II PPA-H
6125.description: The Proton II PPA-H fires large orbs of volatile plasma that explode on impact.  The PPA is effective against infantry and light armor. VS use only.

3091.name: G40-F Ranger
3091.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6002391.name: Glaive IPC
6002391.description: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.

6564.name: VLG Missile Launcher
6564.description: The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

553.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret
553.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

6008907.name: Mauler Cannon
6008907.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

803007.name: NC Triumph Flare Gun
803007.description: The NC Triumph Flare Gun fires a variety of entertaining flare patterns. NC use only.

804742.name: NS-10B Burster
804742.description: This black, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

6004294.name: AM7-XOXO
6004294.description: Play with the hearts of your enemies (?) using this lovingly crafted Archer Anti-Materiel rifle variant. All factions can use NS weapons.

2836.name: M60-G Bulldog
2836.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

804654.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804654.description: The left handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

883.name: Nanite Healing Grenade
883.description:
Shortly after being thrown, this Nanite Healing Grenade creates a temporary Nano-Regen field that quickly mends injured soldiers.

Lasts for 10 seconds.

40000.name: AF-57 Piston
40000.description: Striking a balance between stopping power and rounds per minute, the fully automatic AF-57 Piston is the preferred shotgun for close-quarters combat. NC use only.

41001.name: Phobos VX86
41001.description: Utilizing an energy efficient power core interface, the experimental Phobos VX86 is able to provide sustained fire before needing a new battery. VS use only.

6005304.name: Smoke Grenade
6005304.description:
A grenade which produces a large smoke screen capable of providing cover for a short period of time.

3 second fuse.

6004425.name: Routing Spire
6004425.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that, when powered, houses a spawnpoint Router. All Factions can use this item.

6008752.name: M20 Basilisk
6008752.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.

803031.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803031.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

6002143.name: WLT-Howler Mining Laser
6002143.description: The Howler mining laser can quickly extract Cortium from smaller nodes and wreck player made buildings, but will overheat during prolonged use. All factions can use this weapon.

3701.name: M12 Kobalt
3701.description: The Vanguard M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. NC use only.

6003704.name: NS-45 "Brass" Pilot
6003704.description: This unassuming three-round burst compact pistol carries surprising stopping power in close quarters. All factions can use NS weapons.

804704.name: Cortium Silo
804704.description: Silos hold up to 50,000 Cortium and are required to power modules and other core structures. ANTs are required to deposit additional Cortium into a Silo.

41002.name: Deimos VA29
41002.description: The Deimos VA29 is one of Vanu Amerish's most popular shotguns. Its high damage energy shells mow through enemy soldiers at a frightening pace. VS use only.

15024.name: M6 Onslaught
15024.description: The M6 Onslaught was designed as a defensive alternative to the MX1, allowing for a higher rate of fire suitable for holding down important locations. TR use only.

16013.name: NCM2 Falcon
16013.description: The NCM2 Falcon is the standard for the NC's anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. It features powerful warheads capable of heavily damaging enemy vehicles and MAXes alike. NC use only.

5504.name: M20 Drake
5504.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6560.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6560.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

16016.name: NS-10 Burster
16016.description: The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. NC use only.

6002498.name: Light Air Terminal
6002498.description: The Light Air Terminal can be used to spawn light aircraft such as ESFs and Valkyries at the cost of Cortium.

154.name: Shield Recharging Field
154.description:
Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 6 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.

479.name: Recon Detection Device 4
479.description: The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.5 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.

803489.name: G40-F Ranger
803489.description: The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon.  It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6004871.name: WLT-ARX Mining Laser
6004871.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

6005328.name: Sticky Grenade
6005328.description:
A Frag Grenade coated in a kinetic adhesive, allowing it to stick to almost any surface upon impact.

3 second fuse.

6005376.name: Medical Applicator 5
6005376.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6003611.name: NS "Heatwave" Decimator
6003611.description: Designed for raw power, the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.

4900.name: M18 Needler
4900.description: The M18 Needler is the standard air superiority nose cannon for the TR Mosquito.  Its small caliber rounds allow it to sustain fire for longer and at a higher fire rate.  TR use only.

6102.name: M12 Kobalt-H
6102.description: The M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.

1627.name: Medical Applicator 3
1627.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

5215.name: CAS30 Tank Buster
5215.description: The CAS30 Tank Buster armor piercing rounds are highly effective against tanks. All factions can use this weapon.

3157.name: L100 Python HEAT
3157.description: The Python HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. All factions can use this weapon.

95.name: Medical Applicator 1
95.description:
A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

6003398.name: Pelter Rocket Pod
6003398.description: The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

6005638.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Tower
6005638.description: Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).

804428.name: NS-61G Emissary
804428.description: The fully automatic NS-61G Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. This variant of the NS-61 features a stylish gold finish. All factions can use this weapon.

3100.name: C75 Viper
3100.description: The C75 is able to rapid fire six 75mm HEAT shells.  The damage potential is great when all shells hit their target, but the cannon is unstable when firing at the maximum rate. All factions can use this weapon.

6005644.name: Infantry Tower
6005644.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units.

1265.name: Ammunition Package 3
1265.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers

5495.name: Hyena Missile Launcher
5495.description: The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.

7412.name: Manticore SX40
7412.description: Designed as an all-purpose sidearm for VS soldiers, the Manticore SX40 is able to perform well in any situation. VS use only.

6126.name: Saron HRB-H
6126.description: The Saron HRB fires a fast and accurate armor damaging particle beam. Accuracy destabilizes for a split second after each shot.  VS use only.

17001.name: Comet VM2
17001.description: The Comet VM2 is the standard-issue anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. The explosive plasma orbs it fires are capable of melting through heavy tank armor. VS use only.

802874.name: MR11 Gatekeeper
802874.description: Based on a modified Fracture design, the Gatekeeper retains the feel of its forerunner but incorporates a faster fire rate and projectile speed while increasing overall accuracy.

6006081.name: Nightshade
6006081.description: This ornate blade hums with purpose, as if it has a hunger waiting to be satiated. The corrosive edge dissolves any metal it touches, but is somehow protected from devouring itself.

6005167.name: M40 Fury-F
6005167.description: The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor.  It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor.  All factions can use this weapon.

803820.name: AE Nano-Armor Kit 6
803820.description:
Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.

3707.name: C85 Canister
3707.description: The C85 fires a canister of heavy shrapnel that is effective against infantry and light armor. NC use only.

6005473.name: M20 Drake
6005473.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6008908.name: Mauler Cannon
6008908.description: Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.

803433.name: Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower
803433.description: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.

7108.name: Reaper DMR
7108.description: The powerful and accurate Reaper DMR was developed to fulfill the needs of soldiers who prefer to provide support from a distance. NC use only.

6005664.name: NS-G Commando
6005664.description: The Commando is built for utility in harsh environments and bears a deadly edge in close quarters combat.

804269.name: Repair Module
804269.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. NC use only.

5520.name: A30 Walker
5520.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

6005224.name: S12 Renegade
6005224.description: The S12 Renegade is an effective shotgun that is lethal to soft targets at close range. All factions can use this weapon.

6004995.name: Ectoblaster
6004995.description:
Originally pitched as a research tool to measure Anomaly variance, the Ectoblaster releases a barrage of plasma before overheating. Users are cautioned not to cross the streams.

Limited event item.

804750.name: NS-10G Burster
804750.description: This gold, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

803009.name: VS Triumph Flare Gun
803009.description: The VS Triumph Flare Gun fires a variety of entertaining flare patterns. VS use only.

804874.name: RD-GG Recon Device 2
804874.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.

1949.name: Skorpios
1949.description: The Skorpios was created as an outdoor SMG to bolster the survivability of the Vanu Sovereignty's frightening Wraith squads when their cloaked Flashes were past running condition.

804746.name: NS-10B Burster
804746.description: This black, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.

6005713.name: The Little Helper
6005713.description: Crafted in secret, this workshop item has a combat presence similar to the NS Baron G5. While the festive design is painted to resemble older weaponry with wooden pieces, the trees on Auraxis proved too difficult to use as raw material.

803606.name: Rampart Wall
803606.description: Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.

5225.name: C150 Dalton
5225.description: The C150 Dalton fires 150mm Armor Piercing Anti-Tank rounds that inflict massive damage in a single shot. All factions can use this weapon.

803598.name: Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower
803598.description: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.

6555.name: CAS 14-E
6555.description: The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

2834.name: M60-G Bulldog
2834.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

39000.name: FA1 Barrage
39000.description: The gas-powered, semi-automatic FA1 Barrage's narrow shot pattern allows it to put down enemies at ranges beyond other shotguns. TR use only.

6552.name: M20 Wyvern
6552.description: The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6005070.name: LB00 Python AP
6005070.description: The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

7170.name: AC-X11
7170.description: The powerful AC-X11 was released shortly before Auraxis' global war yet still remains in common use due to its famed reliability and high stopping power. NC use only.

6004754.name: M4-F Pillager
6004754.description: The Pillager lays down a field of flames which ignite infantry caught within. TR use only.

5052.name: Coyote Missiles
5052.description: The Coyote Missile platform's proximity-based homing missiles excel at destroying lightly armored aircraft, but are less proficient at harming heavily armored targets. TR use only.

17024.name: Nebula VM20
17024.description: The Nebula VM20's overclocked power core interface allows for a rapid rate of fire to quickly dispatch enemy infantry in close quarters. VS use only.

803615.name: Bunker
803615.description: Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.

79.description: Aptly named, the  T9 CARV's rate of fire allows it to cut through whole groups of enemies before needing to reload. TR use only.
79.name: T9 CARV

6005663.name: Light Vehicle Terminal
6005663.description: The Light Vehicle Terminal can be used to spawn small and medium sized ground vehicles at the cost of Cortium.

1083.name: MAX Punch
1083.description: Powered exosuits swinging heavy MAX weaponry have proven to have devastating effects on soldiers unfortunate enough to get in the way.

803035.name: AA SpitFire Turret
803035.description:
Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages hostile infantry within 50 meters. Only one spitfire can be active at a time.

35 second cooldown.

804873.name: RD-GG Recon Device 2
804873.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.

802898.name: Aphelion VEX-4H
802898.description: This experimental laser weapon can tear through enemies with sustained fire, but an interesting side effect causes a build up of residual energy while firing that can be harnessed into a devastating blast.

804657.name: NS-20 Gorgon
804657.description: The right handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.

5506.name: M20 Drake
5506.description: The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

6006402.name: Halberd-H SE
6006402.description: This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.

6009047.name: Javelin XS-1
6009047.description:
Single use consumable. Carry up to 2 on the field between resupplies. 40 max.
The Javelin XS-1 is an experimental single-passenger vehicle with hover capabilities, allowing it to quickly traverse all types of terrain.

6002142.name: WLT-Howler Mining Laser
6002142.description: The Howler mining laser can quickly extract Cortium from smaller nodes and wreck player made buildings, but will overheat during prolonged use. All factions can use this weapon.

88.description: The 99SV is the standard issue semi-automatic sniper rifle of TR Infiltrators. An accurized variant of the DMR-99, the 99SV allows the shooter to hit multiple follow-up shots at long range. TR use only.
88.name: 99SV

1879.name: NC6A GODSAW
1879.description: Co-developed with Genudine's Offense Development team, the NC6A GODSAW incorporates an alternate firing mode which allows the weapon to pierce heavy armor in exchange for reduced infantry damage.

6005459.name: A30 Walker
6005459.description: The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

2835.name: M60-G Bulldog
2835.description: The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry.  Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

6008910.name: Bastion Battery
6008910.description: The bastion battery is manned and launches dumb-fire missiles.

3400.name: Supernova PC
3400.description: The Supernova PC quickly reloads its high-explosive anti-tank plasma charges that carry balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. VS use only.

6005743.name: NS-W Survivor
6005743.description: This multi-purpose combat knife is built for winter environments, with a self-sharpening hardlight edge; built-in hand warmers; and a smaller, pommel-mounted blade for rope cutting and climbing.

6005703.name: Routing Spire
6005703.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that, when powered, houses a spawnpoint Router. All Factions can use this item.

6006064.name: M202 Wyrm
6006064.description: The M202 Wyrm wing-mounted machine guns fire slow, high-damage rounds most effective against heavily armored land and air vehicles.

802899.name: M96 Mjolnir
802899.description: Affectionately referred to as "The Boombox" by many NC soldiers, the Mjolnir's burst fire explosive rounds excel against armored targets in close quarters engagements.

3401.name: M12 Kobalt
3401.description: The Magrider M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. VS use only.

6005542.name: WLT-Weaver Mining Turret
6005542.description: This nose-mounted mining turret can fire heavy machine gun rounds with its primary fire, and harvest cortium from long range with its mining laser alternate fire.

6004870.name: WLT-ARX Mining Laser
6004870.description: The Mandible mining laser harvests minerals from Cortium nodes at a steady pace, converting them into transportable material.

803498.name: WLT-Yellowjacket Mining Laser
803498.description: This top-mounted mining laser allows a gunner to quickly harvest additional Cortium and siege enemy structures, but sacrifices defensive capabilities to do so.

7525.name: Blueshift VM5
7525.description: The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.

7125.name: SABR-13
7125.description: The SABR-13's two-round burst fire mode was originally developed with ammunition conservation in mind. It has since become popular with marksmen because of its ability to reliably land those two rounds on target from long range. TR use only.

75063.name: NS-44 Commissioner
75063.description: The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.

6002526.name: Orbital Strike Uplink
6002526.description: This uplink structure can unleash a devastating attack from orbit. When powered and charged, any target in range can be designated using a tool obtained from the uplink terminal. Longer distance strikes cost additional charge, so frequent or long distance attacks will require longer term defense of the structure.

804883.name: RD-GG Recon Device 5
804883.description: This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.25 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.

6003059.name: MKV-P Suppressed
6003059.description: This platinum MKV has an integrated suppressor that prevents the user from showing on the minimap when firing. It features superior bullet velocity and long range stopping power compared to SMGs using optional aftermarket suppressors. All factions can use NS weapons.

4001.name: M12 Kobalt
4001.description: The Prowler M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. TR use only.

3402.name: M20 Basilisk
3402.description: The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. VS use only.

6005657.name: Cortium Silo
6005657.description: Silos hold up to 50,000 Cortium and are required to power modules and other core structures. ANTs are required to deposit additional Cortium into a Silo.

6005640.name: Faction Banner
6005640.description: Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.

1268.name: Ammunition Package 6
1268.description: A deployable ammunition pack that replenishes the ammo supplies of nearby soldiers
